reviewText: I don't understand why are Leveret pajamas so highly rated. I have various problems with them and I think I've bought 4-5 different sets of them through years. My main problem is that they are not correct size. For example I buy for the 5 year old and after a while it looks like kid grew up overnight or I was sent a smaller size. I think the fabric shrinks and quite a lot. And it's actually ironic, because the pajama shirt sleeves and shirt itself get very short but in all the sets the pants have stretched out well beyond looking good. Put the "For fire safety, These pajamas should fit snugly" into pretty funny perspective. The fabric's coloring also fades, so that after few washes it looks like they have been used for many years and probably by many different kids. I do like that they have neutral and generic patterns, not Disneyworld characters, but with all the quality issues, I will not be buying them again.
summary: Too small, colors fade and fabric stretches out

reviewText:
I received this product at a discount for my honest review.
I love these socks, they fit so well I am very pleased. Some things that you need to know about me and socks, I never ever match, I like different kinds in the pack so I do not have to match my dryer eats socks anyway so what is the point of matching socks, I wear a 7 -8 shoes and I have very wide feet, and I wear low top shoes mostly athletic. These socks are very low cut and fit great with the type of shoes I wear. With me having wide feet I always have to buy size 9-11 or they do not fit right and slide down in the shoe as I walk which is very annoying. These socks fit correctly so no socks show but they are not small enough to where they slide when I walk or jog. If you have ever had a sock slide when you walk, jog, exercise you know how annoying it feels to keep having to pull it up or remove the shoe and pull on the sock when you are trying to work out it makes the workout longer and more annoying.
I wear converse low tops and I have a pair of new balance running shoes that I wear constantly they show a little more with my converse but that really does not bother me, they hardly show at all when I wear my new balance shoes. These came in a variety of designs the colors are all either black, white or grey which is ok I would have liked more color choices at the time of purchase I am all about mixing and matching colors. I love the material it is not too thick to wear my shoes do not fit but not thin to where it feels like I am not wearing any socks. The material is somewhere in the middle and not itchy, they are soft probably cotton if I had to guess. The elastic on them is great not too tight so there are no rings around my ankle area when I remove them. These socks came with no rips or tears or loose seams.
Over all I am pleased with this purchase I got 12 pairs of socks, that fit the right way that I like and that are not too thick and uncomfortable that I cannot get my shoes on. The designs are perfect, were I wish there were more color choices the white, black, and grey different designs still allow me to mix and match. I would recommend these and would definitely purchase more.

These socks are really cute, but I wish they were a little bit bigger. I wear a size 10, and they are hard to get over my heel without feeling like they're going to rip. Not bad enough to be a total deal breaker, but a wee bit more room would be nice. The animal patterns are great- I love wearing leopard and tiger stripes, etc. and I always wear ankle or no-show socks, so they are perfect for me in that respect. The patterns are woven, not printed, so that means a LOT of loose thread inside the socks, which can be kind of annoying, as even a little rough spot on a toenail can snag in them. I'm probably going to keep a few pair and give the rest to smaller-footed family members.
Disclosure: This product was provided to me at a promotional discount for testing, and I agreed to provide my honest review. I am not affiliated with this company and make absolutely no promises of a good review for receiving the product; my opinions are my own, and are based on my personal experience with the item. I rely on customer reviews when I shop on Amazon, and it is my sincere hope that my review will help other shoppers make an informed decision. If you have questions, feel free to comment on this review, and I will do my best to help.

My husband loves this watch.  There's not lots of instruction of how to read and operate the watch, but we caught on really fast.  My husband is a collector of watches and he loves how unique this watch is.  He works in law enforcement and many of his buddies are also as enamored with the watch as he is.  The only thing we have found negative is the fact that the battery has already gone out on the watch.  It is a larger button-style battery.  I highly recommend this unique watch!

First let me say that my son absolutely loves this watch.  It is so unique that he's getting compliments galore.  You're probably wondering why only three stars.  The reason for this is that the watch came with no instructions, none!  There are only two buttons so it shouldn't be difficult to figure out, right?  Wrong!  I spent over 1/2 hour trying to get this set for him before I gave it to him and I finally managed to get the date and time.  I have not been able to figure out how to use the alarms nor have I been able to figure out how to set the display so that it lights up every 5 minutes (or whatever allocated time period we want).  I don't even know what other features it has because the instructions are missing.  I sent an email to the seller and have not received any response.  I actually went to a competitor's product on Amazon that has the exact same watch with a different name and I read their reviews and found some instructions from other reviewers which helped me to get as far as I did.  Frankly, if I had it to do over again, I'd buy from the other supplier because their reviewers at least noted that set up was easy due to the enclosed instructions their product came with.

I received a discount for this product in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion.  I know many potential buyers get concerned when they see someone has received a discount in exchange for a review as they worry that the review may be inflated.  I myself pay attention to this when reading reviews on products I'm considering purchasing.  Please be assured that receiving a discount in no way influences my reviews as I am committed to providing accurate information based solely on my experiences with products for the benefit of all other buyers.
summary: Watch is awesome BUT no instructions, hard to figure out, seller NON-RESPONSIVE!

reviewText: LOVE IT!

I wear a hat everyday, that's just how I roll, no other hat that I own gets anything close to the number of compliments I get for this hat. Strangers ask me where I got this hat. A guy asked me once if I could check the tag because he wanted to know who made it. My best tried to bust my chops then he realized he couldn't. What really sets this hat apart too is the cork bill. It would not have the same gravitas without it. The cork bill really brings the whole design together. I'm looking forward to getting more of these designs to see if I get more positive reactions. This dress really is gorgeous and would be perfect for a wedding, baby shower, the office, or just an everyday nice outfit. reviewText: Awesome

The dress is incredibly beautiful and wonderfully made. My mom is a seamstress and was in awe at how wonderfully made the dress is. I did the custom order, however the dress came a little big and I can't wear it. If you do the custom order, make sure your measurements are correct. Don't fudge them in any way. I don't know if I was just measured wrong, but mine came too big in the bust and too long for me, but that was my custom measurements. My mom was going to try and fix it but because of how the dress is sewn together, she can't. She wouldn't have all the patience to redo the beading. They did give me back a good portion of money though and let me keep the dress, so that was really nice. I really love the dress.

The bottoms were also sewn on crooked so the whole thing looked cockeyed. Wish I could return it as I can't even wear it, but the cost of shipping it back is almost as much of the suit. I am a 40C and wear a 16-18 in jeans typically. When they say that this is a "mini dress" they mean MINI. I'm 5"5' and it hit mid-thigh, mostly because of the cut. I bought a 2X in this and it squished my chest down where a 3x would have sufficed, and my butt is so big that it lifted the back about an inch. I couldn't squat or sit comfortably in this garment. It's just not for curvy ladies. It's a shame because the neckline and bodice fit well, but once it hits the natural waist there is no give or flare where it should be- it bunches up in places it shouldn't and looks super trashy.

That's not including how the seaming down the chest was puckered before I tried it on.

I am sending it back because it is not a(n appropriate) dress for me. If I wasn't so curvy it would look a ton better.

This review is for the Summer Tops for Women,Timeson Womens Flatter Tie-Dye Banque Tunic Tank Tops XX-Large Royal Blue.

This is a beautiful top that is perfect for summer. I really was attracted to the tunic design. I like tops that don't cling and force me to wear undergarments. I am a size 12 and after reading all the prior reviews on this top, I decided to go one size up and order the XXL. Normally I wear a size XL. This top ended up being PERFECT and fitting exactly like how an American XL would fit. So whatever size you are normally, DO size up ONE size and it will be exactly the right fit.

I purchased the ombre Royal blue. This is NOT a royal blue. This is turquoise fading to dark turquoise. There is no royal blue color at all in this. I was OK with that because turquoise is actually my favorite color to wear. The Amazon photograph is actually VERY accurate for what this top looks like and the color. However, I believe the seller should consider renaming the color choice as it creates confusion. The ombre is a beautiful deep color combination. The fade is gradual and it creates a flattering color combination. I appreciate the dark color being on the bottom  it actually is very slimming. The turquoise is very jewel tone and rich.

The fabric on this top is almost see through, so I ended up wearing a cami. This top is PERFECT for summer. It is light and airy. It does not cling and it allows the skin to breath. I took a photograph against a window so you could see how the fabric looks when you hold up the top. If you are getting a dark color like black, and wear a black bra underneath it should be ok. If you are getting a light color, you may need to wear a cami I am not sure. The ombre one I got is dark but I still wanted coverage. This top is SOOOO comfortable though, but in the winter you would need to wear a jacket with it.

The bottom has a stretchable banding on it that holds it close to the body. It looks so cute with a pair of tight blue jeans. The neckline is scoop but not too low. The sleeves are not tight but just perfect. They also have elastic banding and a slight ruche to the shoulder. I throw this in the wash on cold, delicate cycle with mild detergent. I then hang dry it. It does NOT fade or shrink, it comes out looking like new. I wouldnt really recommend drying this in the dyer, I don't know what the fabric would do. This top looks so stylish and cute, its great for church but also going out. 5/5 stars

Ordered the Yazilind Plate Red Fox Popcorn Chain Necklace Earrings Bracelet Women Jewelry Set when the company still delivered to the UK back in Oct 2016 as have purchased several items from Yazilind in the past and always been very pleased with the quality and price.  I delayed writing this review until wearing the set for awhile.

The set arrived displayed on a standard cardboard jewelry display card and is a cute little Red Fox set containing a necklace, earrings and bracelet all made of metal with red stone/plastic inserts used in each item.  I examined all the pieces closely checking for missing or broken parts and tested the quality by gently tugging on the links, clasps and hooks to see if anything was insecure, but all remained intact and secure.

The bracelet is a chain link style with decorative circular metal discs and links plus a small fox holding a red oval and a standard crab/lobster claw chain clasp. The earrings are small metal foxes holding a red oval hanging from standard hooks for pierced ears. The necklace has a larger fox holding a red oval hanging from a popcorn chain that reflects the metal design of the foxes. I found the metal clasp on the bracelet a little stiff to open when it arrived and have arthritis in my fingers which doesn't help but have small hands so used the furthest link to attach it and now just slip it onto my wrist.

This is a cute little set that is suitable for day wear or to brighten up an otherwise plain outfit - I am allergic to metal so unable to wear the earrings for more than a couple of hours without them becoming irritated, but have worn them out a few times while the necklace and bracelet has had plenty of wear!  It is an unusual and eye catching set that always gets positive comments when worn so would happily recommend it to others.
All of the red stone/plastic pieces were broken off...not a problem just glued them back...but the necklace broke just sitting at my desk fell right into my lap. The clasp was unrepairable.

It's a style of shirt that I am still getting used to, but it is growing on me.  :)  This is one of the most comfortable shirts I own.  I think the shirt is a little on the large side.  I would have been better off ordering a size down.

reviewText:
I really love how the blouse is made. It's light weight and very airy. You can wear this in the summer or winter. If you wear it in the winter make sure you put an under shirt on because it will be very cool with the openings on the side of the shirt. (As you can see in the photo). I wear this shirt with shorts or tights and it looks great. It's easy to iron and of course you can just throw it in the dryer on wrinkle guard. The cuffs on the arms are easy to tie and the quality is good. Regarding the size- I prob would have gotten an extra small, vs a small-as I'm 126 and approx 5"7 with a 32C chest- Overall I love the blouse. It looks just as it does in the photos.

Product Disclosure: I received this product free for my honest review. This review is 100% my own opinion. Others experiences may vary. I received no monitory compensation and I am not required to give a four or five star good review. I am also not associated with the seller in any way. reviewText:
The fit was as expected from reading the reviews.  I'm normally an xs but ordered a small and the fit was great for what I wanted (fitted); shoulders are a bit narrow but not so much that it takes from the shape.  As others have stated, the quality is great for the price, even at $60 the quality would warrant the price (except for that sad little hanging button we all have to refasten).

The things I didn't like are the things you can't see in the blurry photo (should have been my first clue).  I've been looking for 2 years for a white blazer I can wear open with straight, clean lines; from the image, it appears as if you can.  However, it doesn't quite fall the same way.  Doable, but I'm settling because I'm not wasting money on shipping.

The shoulders aren't puckered, but there is a gathered double seem which is okay, but again, I didn't see in the picture and wouldn't have ordered if the details were visible.

Also, you cannot see the seem that runs just below the rib cage.  I didn't see that in the image and would not have purchased (I know that sounds trivial but I liked the lines of the jacket the way they appeared without that seem).

I've attached images of the jacket (pre-ironed as well- sorry) that show it closed and open, plus a close up of the seem and cut of the jacket.  The jacket is lined and ironed well and easily.

Overall, the quality is fantastic, the fit is how I want it, but it simply does not match the picture, and that's why I took off two stars.  I feel angry as if it was on purpose (whether or not it was or wasn't, it's how I feel when I spend my money on something that doesn't meet my expectations.  Hopefully, you can see what the jacket truly looks like to make a better informed decision on whether it's a look you would like or not.

For reference, I'm 5'4", 120lbs

Overall, I give these a 4 star for a few reasons.  First off, I love how light weight they are. It honestly feels like they are not even on and they don't irritate my ears like most earrings. I also like how I have the option to just wear the first piece alone or add the second piece for a fancier look. Additionally, the company included an extra set of backings just in case the others get lost.  So, overall these earrings are pretty and I'm happy with them.  Now, there are two reasons why I didn't give them a 5 star. One was because even though they are pretty, you can up close that they are kinda on the cheap side. Second of all, they were really hard to put on. It took me a long time just to get these beauties on and I ended up just having my husband help me. If it wasn't for those two things,  I would have definitely given them a 5. I did receive these earring for a discount in exchange for an honest and unbias review.
summary: Love that I have a choice with these

I will definitely be looking at what else they have to offer because I know the product will be high quality and worth the price.

I would recommend these earrings to anyone looking at them. These will not disappoint you!

Summer is coming and I thought I would take a chance on these as a non-drop earring in case I am holding my toddler niece! You can guess why.

What I really appreciate is the detail. The cubic zirconia center stones are brilliant and look real. Then, there are tiny cz stones inside of the loops that encircle the center stones. If you look at the product picture up close on Amazon you can see this.

They are nickel and allergy free, something that is a must. I had no issues wearing them. They are very comfortable and well-made. This is perfect for yourself or to give as a gift. The price point is great and worth it with the quality and make of the earrings. You would pay more at a department store for something of less quality.

The earrings arrived quickly after I ordered them, nicely packaged in a cute, maroon box. This can be for storage, or, as stated previously, for a gift. I highly recommend these. They exceeded my expectations!

reviewText:
I received this product from the seller for free or at a discounted price for the purpose of review. As a customer, I have always depended quite heavily on customer reviews based on prior purchases. In my experience, it has been more reliable than descriptions or specs could ever be. Not to mention a great source of advice on the best way to maximize the product that you are receiving whether for installation, assembly or even just recommendations on improving on products that may have weaknesses while still being considered a good product. I rely heavily on the experiences of previous customers and their experiences, so I do take reviewing items seriously and try to cover points that I may want to consider in a purchase. That being said, please note my reviews are honest and unbiased and if you would like to review past product reviews for reference, please feel free to visit my profile. I ordered this for our toddler recently and we received it in the mail this week. Very simple packaging, so all was well there. The outfit is an adorable piece to have in her wardrobe. A little something different than what you can usually find in the stores so I was pretty quick to order it for her. I did order it a size larger than what her size is. All too often, things that are ordered online come in too small so I usually do order that way as a safe bet. That being said, I really did need to, not at all. It actually seems like it is a little bit bigger than the size it is said to be, especially in length and she is already a tall girl. So it will be a little bit longer than I expected before she can wear it. That is not a horrible thing since it should last a little bit longer than most things do. I was just really excited to have her wear it because this romper is SUPER CUTE! I love the patter of it and the matching headband, simple and sweet. The outfit seems to be pretty moveable, a good thing with our little ball of chaos and the material is very soft and comfortable. Cute new piece at a great price.
summary: Adorable design and pattern in a very soft and moveable material. Great buy!

reviewText: So soft.  Love these for my toddler.

These are so soft and the elastic isn't tight at all.  The underwear stay up well on my son.  He wears 4T clothes (he's a little skinny but tall) and the mediums will probably fit for a couple of years.

My sister bought us these a while back and I am so happy with the gift.  They are gender-neutral, organic, not all thick and bulky like "trainers" (which do no good to hold in an accident or to help kids learn to hold it until they get to a potty anyway, so what's the point?) , the size keeps working as your child grows so they can be used a long time, and best of all, my two year old can put them on all by himself easily.  They are reversible inside-out and back-and-forth.  I previously had some undies for him that were designed to help the child figure out how to put them on themself, but he didn't want to put those on himself--it was too difficult and complicated.  These are so much easier for him and he is always so proud of himself for putting them on.  I cannot recommend these more highly.  The fabric is very high quality and is holding up to lots of washing, still looking new.

I really like the design and colors of this umbrella.  However, I am concerned about how long this will last.  Already a couple of the metal pieces that hold the fabric to the frame have popped off.  I can easily put them back on, but it seems they should be more secure.  Also, I sometimes have a hard time with it locking in open position.  I hope this doesn't fail with further use.  Time will tell.  I've only been able to use it a few times.  The handle is a nice concept, but my wrist barely fits in between the opening so it's struggle to get it back off if I try to put it on my wrist for the "hands free" option.

**UPDATE**
Ylovetoys took it upon themselves to send me a new umbrella due to my previous review of the product I received.  I am increasing my rating to 5 Stars for their wonderful customer service.  The new umbrella I received has no defects and is in good working condition.

reviewText: I purchased this product to wear during my post-abdominal surgery recovery.  I needed something comfortable and decided to try these. I wore a pair for the first time today and I was super pleased.  The material is stretchy, super soft, and comfortable. Even my husband commented about the softness of the material. Was not what I thought I was ordering. Misleading image! While this product could work for some it did not work for me and our baby. The size seemed to be as expected however material looks different from what you see in the image, also in the image you can see there are snap ons between the legs and there is nothing like that in the item that arrived. It also fit our baby differently. Who would make baby overalls without snap on is beyond me. So to change out baby I had to take overall off completely and it is inconvenient to say the least if you are not at home. A lot of places don't have changing stations and you have improvise at times and this just make it so much harder. If I knew it wasn't a snap on at the bottom would not have ordered it. We got this for our private wedding ceremony, in hopes for baby's comfort and to match daddy's suit, so by the time it arrived there was no time to order something else. The quality is also very poor. The threads were hanging off of it everywhere. I spent good 10 min cutting them off. When it came out of the washer and dryer it was so wrinkled and straps were so terrible looking, I had to iron the straps and the collar and the rest of the overalls. Not to mention the image showed that the stars have more than one button on each side leading you to believe straps can be adjusted, which is also misleading.
WILL NOT BUY AGAIN. NOT worth what they charged you for it.
summary: Not what is advertised!! Not the same product is in the image of the baby wearing it.

This tie broke on the 2nd wearing.  Because my grandson, (15), liked it so much I ordered another.  He's worn it once and it's ok, however, in the meantime, a 2nd zipper tie from this company broke.  So now you know why I gave it 1 star!  I'm done!

Somehow or other, the zipper part was pulled through so tightly that by the time I kept trying to get it in a position to use, the knot had come apart.  This appears to be more of a "youth" size than a man's size.  We have many zipper ties for my adult disabled son.  This is not the same size. I'm not even sure this is a "youth" size.

I've only used this Zipper Tie once but I'm very happy with how well it worked.  The tie looks very good and seems to be well made (made in China).  The zipper worked very well.  Once I put it on and zipped it up there was no way to tell I hadn't just tied my own tie.  Only time will tell just how well it will hold up to repeated (once every three or four weeks) use.  I would suggest that if you're having problems tying your ties (my hands don't work as they should) for any reason, then buy a zipper tie and see how easy it is to use.

reviewText: Ibiza Chillout Compass Adjustable Nautical Bracelet (Large) I don't wear a lot of jewelry on a regular basis and I tend to dress wearing fairly muted colors. I wanted to step a little out of my comfort zone and wear one of these bracelets to add some color into my look. First off, I was very pleased with the packaging. It would make a nice gift. I also closely inspected the workmanship and overall quality. I was very impressed with both. I chose the orange and purple with the compass. I have worn the bracelet a few times already and I have been complimented on it each time. It is a conversation starter and the compass isn't just for show. It works. I am an avid survivalist and pack a go-bag for emergencies, but there are some emergencies that you can't even grab a bag for. It is nice to know that in a sudden emergency, not only would I have a working compass, but I know I could find use for the rope and solid metal that the bracelet is made of. I also really like the way it closes. The metal bolt screws in, so once its on, you don't have to worry about it falling off. I was fortunate enough to get to purchase this bracelet for a discount in exchange for an honest review, but I am very pleased with the look and quality of this bracelet.
summary: Looks Great On, and Gets Attention.

reviewText: I ordered this bracelet because my husband and a group of people from church are going on a mission trip to Guatemala in October.  I felt like this was a very nice looking and masculine enough to give to a man.  I would like to get a necklace or bracelet for each member of the mission team and give it to them before they leave on the trip.  This bracelet is very nice, high quality nautical theme made of yachting rope and stainless steel fastener.  I love that it has the compass sure to please just  about anyone.  I did receive this item at a discount for an honest review so that is what I am giving you my honest opinion.  Yes I would recommend it to a friend and yes I would buy it again.  If you found this review helpful please mark below. Thank you!

This Bracelet looks and feels great. It is a great gift, too for any occasion. It is good for both sexes -- Father's Day, Mother's Day, etc. ... it will be welcome. It was beautifully designed and the quality is solid. The band and metal components are top notch in terms of quality. The wound macrame give a special look and it is waterproof rope. What a beautiful design for anyone who enjoys hiking or sailing. I highly recommend this awesome bracelet -- you won't regret purchasing it!!

Please note, I have no relationship with this seller, and I only review products I really want to try out! All opinions here are my own. Did receive this at lower price in exchange for an unbiased and honest critique. I take my reviews seriously and I always provide my honest feedback. Thank you!

The only thing that confused me was how to get it on and off. I know that must sound silly but I went to try it on and it was too small to squeeze over my hand so I had to unscrew the latch and then it was kinda hard to get it back together once I had it on. I guess I will leave that to them to figure out. This is really nice and I think that its more for a female but everyone has there own taste. Great bracelet, great colors and well made.

The added feature of a small compass on the buckle is a definite added plus.

okay, so based off the price and the quicker than expected delivery, not a bad purchase. the material is also thicker than expected which is nice since the back is so low I don't have to worry about wearing a bra with it. (if you're shy about nipples showing in the slightest you definitely will have to though) with that being said, the purchase arrives with thread hanging off on it in multiple spots, as well as a rip on the shoulder. I'm nervous to wear it because I don't want it to stretch and rip even more, or completely rip, revealing that I'm not wearing a bra. it's also a bit smaller than I thought it would be, which I should've seen coming knowing where it was being shipped from. sizes are always smaller. but I'm 5' 120lbs and I ordered a small, though I should've gotten a medium. it fits but is a little uncomfortable in some spots. I knew it would ride up since it's a thong style, but it leaves a little bulge on my lower back (because there is a bit of extra material) and it rides up really bad. the leg holes are also ridiculously high, they go up to the bottom of my waist making it difficult to find a good pairing with it. a nice high rise skirts looks good, but low rise jeans or regular shorts look very funny. even some of my high waisted shorts are not quite high enough. so all in all it was a decent purchase for a cheap price. I just really wish I hadn't received mine with a rip in the shoulder. I don't want to have to wait through the process of sending it back to receive a new one, so I guess I'll have to be extremely cautious when wearing to avoid more tearing (ha ha rhyming is fun)
summary: you get what you pay for

reviewText:
I don't know what it is about kids pajamas, but they never seem to hold up in our household. Our kids pajamas always seem to end up fading and piling faster than any other clothing that gets worn just as much (if not more!) than pjs. I am always looking for a better quality pajama to try, and came across Phoebe Cat Girls Pajamas. I thought the crocodile design was cute and not something you see often for little girls.

When the set arrived, I like the simple plastic fold-over bag that it came in. It was simple, but clean looking. The pjs were folded nicely inside. At first glance, the fabric was quite soft and the colors vivid. Further inspection yielded more quality workmanship: the crocodile on the front of the shirt is fully embroidered; excellent stitching on the hems; solid colors without any cracking or fading. I also liked that the neckline of the shirt is double stitched on the edges which gives it a classy look.

The sizing seems spot on for this set. Pajamas are supposed to be worn a bit tighter for safety purposes, and I do not think ordering your childs regular size will be an issue. I got my daughter a 5T and it is a bit big on her as she is currently a 4T but on the tall size. The length is great and she has a bit more room to grow into width and height wise.

The only aspect of the pajamas that I did not care for as much is the main crocodile design as one of the eyes just doesnt look right. I thought it might have been a flaw, but it is truly just the design of the crocodile (see photo). There is nothing wrong with how the pajamas are made or the design itself, I suppose it is just not my ideal crocodile eye. But, all in all, the crocodile is adorable.

Overall, this is a heavier weight set of pajamas that launders will and fits true to size. The colors and design are vivid and unique. The fabric is soft and comfortable as well. I am glad I ordered this set and my daughter will be getting a lot of use out of these. I might even let my son wear them when he gets older!

I hope that you found my review helpful. I rely on quality reviews to make my purchasing decisions and my goal is to help other customers find what they need. I did receive this product at a discount in exchange for an unbiased and honest review.

 Thanks for reading and happy shopping!
summary: Soft, vivid colors and sized right

I got these pajamas for my almost 4 year granddaughter in a size 5T. She normally wears a size 4T-5T, and these were true to size, fitting just right. The crocodile print is incredibly cute and like many little girls, pink is her favorite color. Not sure if it was the smiling crocodile with the "wonky" eye or just the color, but my granddaughter carried the pajamas around with her the entire first day after receiving them!  And yes, one of the eyes is indeed "wonky" but based on the other reviews and even the advertisement pictures, that eye must be purposely made that way. My only complaint and why I only gave 3 stars is because I don't like the fabric -though it is hard to pinpoint why. Although the fabric is soft and made of 100% cotton, it is kind of  stretchy, and reminds me of cheap leggings or t-shirt material. (You know how those "jersey cotton" sheets feel? Well these pajamas feel like that to me, and I, personally, am not a fan of them.) Not sure how these will hold up after multiple washings, but since kids tend to outgrow clothing long before it wears out, these should last just fine. Because of the fabric texture, I don't think I would purchase these again, but bottom line is my granddaughter loves them, and since I bought these at a discounted price in exchange for my honest review, we'll keep them.

It looks like the image. The lion is hollow and open on one side, which is only a problem if it rolls. As this is billed as a unisex piece of jewelry and I'm a woman, even unstretched it's a little loose on me so it's more likely to turn while I'm wearing it. The beads certainly don't feel like stone, at least not any stone I'm used to and when I peer into the drill holes, it doesn't appear to me that the drilled surface is the same as the outer surface. Without crushing one, I won't be able to be sure, so I'm not in a hurry to wreck something I actually bought. This is something a child could make easily, and that says something about the quality as well. Buyer beware, this isn't a show piece or a piece that will last any certain amount of time. reviewText:
I ordered this white shirt in Size: Large and Color: White. Since the style of the shirt is more like a slim fit I ordered a Large mostly basing on my waistline. For reference, I'm 5'1", 125 lbs and measures 34, 29 and 35.

This shirt gives me a preppy look vibes. I love to pair this with short especially now that it's summer, fit and flare skirt, pencil skirt or skinny style pants for work. I find it easy to take the style of this shirt from an office look to a casual look. In the photo, I open up 2 buttons and rolled up the sleeves a bit for a casual relax look.

This shirt has a nice collar, it's not the regular size collar but thinner one, like a mini club collar. The sleeves is a 3/4 sleeves and has a button that you can loosen up.

As for the fabric, it's 100% cotton so it's very breathable and comfortable. I just wish the shirt is wrinkle free because I hate ironing clothes. It's not too wrinkly after washing and drying it in the dryer but I prefer shirts like this to be as neat as possible so it's really nice if the fabric is one of those wrinkle free and stain resistant fabric. Also the color is not a cool white but a warm white.

Overall, I think this is a very nice shirt. If you're looking for a different style from a regular white shirt then this is a nice option.

reviewText: These are super cute. A little big, but that's better than too small! My 3 year old loves them.

To start off, I want to comment on sizing, since there are a few discrepancies in the other comments I looked at.  My daughter is between a 2T and 3T right now, so nothing really fits great.  I ordered this in the 3T thinking it might be a little big, but would give her room to grow.  When she put this on, it fit perfectly!  So, while I think it runs a little small, I would say by no more than half a size.

The set came in a Ziploc pouch, and I thought the presentation was nice.  I was just expecting them to be loose in the box.  The packaging is see thru, and when I opened the box, my daughter instantly recognized the character and got excited.  The character is screen printed, and looks like it will hold up to the rigors of child use.  My wife opened up the package, and as soon as my daughter saw it she wanted to try them on.  As I mentioned above, the fit was great!

The material is soft, and warm; perfect for lounging or sleeping in.  My daughter put them on right away, and would not take them off, even for dinner.  I like that there was no tag, so there was nothing to irritate her skin.  She ended up wearing it all night, and then wanted to wear the top to school the next day.  Luckily, we had a clean Rainbow Dash shirt, and I was able to swap them.  The pants are cute, with little hearts all over; personally, I wish they had something related to the character, but no one else seemed to mind.  My wife likes to wash everything before we put it on my daughter, so my only warning would be to make sure you do not open this in front of your child, if you are hoping to wash it first.  Once they see it, they will want to wear it!

I did receive this product at a slight discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

The material is nice and the shirt is made very well. I don't imagine that the buttons will be popping off anytime soon. I also can't imagine that this would get any loose threads or holes. It seems to be a quality shirt.

Unfortunately it looks like after regular washing and stretching of the fabric, the graphic will definitely fade significantly. The word "Sweet" on the front is embroidered on, but does not feel scratchy on the backside of the shirt. It's also tagless which is always a plus. My daughter normally wears a 6-6x and has long legs so I bought the set in size 7 to allow for some growing room. The fit is actually spot on which just enough roominess to be comfortable. I washed before wear and didn't seem to notice a lot of shrinkage or loose threads. The stitching seems durable and the bands around the neck, arms and ankles are accommodating. I like the waistband that is very stretchy, but they fit like a pair of thick cotton leggings would. This would be a cute set for any young girl needing comfortable and durable pajamas. Thumbs up!

reviewText:
I initially bought this because it was too darn adorable. But the quality is pretty good too! I always make sure to check measurements online because some things are manufactured in China and don't have the same sizing as the US. So when it said to get a size bigger, possibly two, I got a 4T for my 2T daughter. Well, right out of the packaging I could tell it was a normal size 4T. Luckily I have a daughter who can still fit in some 4T items so I put it on her. You can see in the picture that it's a nice tight fit like PJs are meant to be. So I would recommend buying true to size for what you need and ignoring that recommendation.

In terms of quality, the stitching is nicely done and reminds me of brands you'd find in a department store. Love the simple design--just enough but not too much. My daughter even commented on how cute it was and how much she liked it.

So, overall I would recommend with the caveat that the sizing is more typical to other brands.

Super cute! My daughter loves these! I have just one small issue with them.

Pros:

1) super cute! These look exactly like the picture in regards to color, design (cuffs, etc), and the screenprint on the front of the shirt! It is important to note that the dots on the pants are a screenprint like material as well, so there's that if you don't like that feeling, you may not like these! I find it to be just fine, and frankly the pants are adorable!

2) colors don't fade badly after a wash. Frankly we have washed these several times and the fabric has not faded or bled at all. This is a great thing for me as nothing is worse than combining wash only to find grey things have a pink streak in them. No worries with these Pjs. No color bleeding at all.

3) soft! I love the cotton, and so does my daughter. When we opened the package the Pjs actually felt a bit rough, so I worried a bit about it not washing well and softening up. Turns out I was worried about nothing - they really are nice now, and feel very comfortable when on!

Cons:

1) the big con for me is that these do shrink quite a bit. when we got them I may have said these run true to size, but after the first wash they did shrink quite a bit, so they should be thought of as running just a bit small. I don't think it is a big deal as long as you note this fact and order a size or two up. Additionally, I would only dry on low heat, which we did and it still shrunk. All in all these are awesome and cute pjs so long as you order up in size and wash and dry on cold/ low heat.

reviewText:
I purchased this for myself to wear with leggings. I'm not a big fan of my legs, so I was hoping this would fit me shorter length wise, like a tunic- and it does. So keep in mind- you probably won't want to wear this as a dress by itself because:
- It is very short (I'm 5'1" and the slip part comes to only a couple of inches below my underwear line).
- It rides up a bit because of the slip lining and static/etc.

As the description states- these are Asian plus sizes. I only order Asian sizes if there are measurements included in the description, and I always make sure to double check the measurements of whomever I'm ordering for as well.  I normally wear a US size 2X, and since my measurements lined up with the 4X measurements listed, I ordered that size.

I was very happy to find out that after I recieved the dress at home, the measurements are spot on with what's in the description. I was also glad to see that there is actually a tag inside the dress with the material make-up AND care instructions listed. They say to hand wash; do not dry clean or tumble dry, and you may use a cool iron.

The navy lace is very soft, with a royal blue lining that's also soft and light. I was worried that the lace would be uncomfortable or stiff, but it isn't at all.

Here's the problem(s):
- There is (supposed to be) a button on the back at the nape of the neck, so that when you button it, there is a small keyhole. The button was there when I started writing this review, and even after I tried it on. I didn't even use the button, because I'm by myself and didn't feel like attempting it just to try on. Well, I just looked at the dress again and the button is GONE. I cannot find it anywhere to sew it back on either :(
- There are a few problems with the stitching- puckering at the bottom of the keyhole detail; loose pieces of the lace fabric hanging off the same area, the hem line in the back and on the side; and loose string hanging off the armpit areas, etc. Looks like I forgot to shave my underarms and the hair's coming through! I will have to trim the excess fabric and strings, but I hate having to do that because I don't want to cut a hole or cut too close to the fabric by accident. Blah...
- The circles in the lace on the front of the dress are placed poorly. There are 2 huge circles with smaller circles in them sitting RIGHT where my boobs! Yikes. Not very flattering, especially on someone plus size :(
summary: More of a tunic (too short to wear alone). Button fell off before even buttoning it :(

This dress is beautiful, however, it is also one that you really need to read the measurements AND measure yourself before you purchase. It's described as a party dress, and if you don't like to wear dresses often, that may be true. However, if you like to wear them this is a nice everyday dress as well.

If I was going to wear it as a dress it would definitely need a slip.  The material is not thin (it has a nice weight to it) but it is a bit more sheer than I would be comfortable with!  For myself I would consider hemming 4-5 inches off if using as a dress - I am 5'4" and it makes for a rather long dress on me - with the high waist it would need to be shorter to be flattering.  I love the full skirt on this, no skimping on the material - makes for a great fly away look.

reviewText: It's way too big

I am normally a C cup, but I ended up ordering the D cup because I wanted to see if I could get additional coverage. It does tend to run a little small, but not ridiculously so.

I am really pleased to have this bra! I am a woman who actually has breasts (size C), and have never been able to find a strapless bra that would stay up and allow me to wear cute little tops! I refuse to have my bra showing under my garments, I believe it is not attractive. I have several dresses that have required a strapless bra, and to avoid the constant bra slip, I would put on those clear plastic bra straps - which are miserable. A backless dress was absolutely out of the question. But have have too much to feel comfortable going au- natural.

Getting the bra on takes really no effort. The inside is really really sticky. It's not like "sticker" sticky, more like sticky gel. It is ridiculously sticky,though! Unlike other stick on bras I have purchased in the past, this bra does not have non-adhesive spots for your nipples, so it is a bit uncomfortable during removal.

To apply these, you just peel off the thin plastic covering, stick the bra to one side of your breast, pull it across, and stick it to the side of the other breast. Then pat down. It's that easy. Place it so that they are wide enough apart that your breasts will be a little bit squished together. This gives you a nice cleavage, as well as lift.

When I first tried this bra, I figured out how to get the bra on, but not how to get any "lift". I figured just having the girls contained was enough, even if I looked a little "saggy". But then I discovered that if you place the bra higher on your breasts (like with the bottom part hanging below the bra), you can stick the sides of this bra higher up on your chest, and actually have lift, as well as control. So squeeze them in, and lift them up. I stick and and unstick them a few times (one cup at a time) until I get the girls at just the right height. It is not painful to pull the adhesive off your skin at all.

I wore this bra all day, out in the sun. I sweat a little, was pretty active, and had no problem! You hardly even feel it! Under my shirt, you can't even tell that this is a strapless, backless bra. It just generally looks like I am wearing a normal bra! I am really really impressed!  This bra has thicker padding than I've had on other bras, which some people may appreciate.  I prefer un-padded bras in general, but I'll still wear this one.  The drawstring between the cups is great, because you can squeeze the girls together as much, or as little, as you want.  In reading reviews of other bras, the ones with clips come unhooked, so definitely pick one with a drawstring.

It does not hurt to pull the bra back off. Just put the plastic back on the adhesive, and store the bra in the reusable bag. I don't know how many uses I will get from the adhesive, but it's not like I need to wear this type of bra every day. It will be totally worth it to replace it when the adhesive wears off! Don't have anything on your skin, like lotion or moisture before you apply this bra.

I give it a 4 stars, because for me, I wish it weren't as padded, had more coverage, and had "nipple spots" inside the bra.  Other than that, it is a great bra, and works wonderfully!

I wholeheartedly give this bra an enthusiastic 4 stars. I really like it, and will wear it all the time!
summary: Finally!  A strapless bra that works!  You won't have to keep yanking this one up!

Sweating does end up detaching these covers, so just be aware of that if you're running around in a loose shirt on a hot summer day. And frequent wear does cause the edges to become less sticky over time.

My "nude" colored covers are translucent, so with my light skin and darker nipples, they tend to show through under a thin pale shirt. @Nudwear - please make the centers even more opaque! Would love them even more if they were.

I once wore these covers all day traveling from Boston to Vegas, went touristing, went to a concert and they did not budge or make me uncomfortable all day. They are starting to be less adhesive on the edges but because of the shape and design, it is not visible through my tops. I think they will last me for a a while longer, and once they don't, I will definitely buy another pair!!

I sent Lisong my measurements via the "Contact seller" option per their request on the item description. After some back and forth, they were able to verify that my measurements were sent to the manufacturer and I received a skirt that was proportional to my waist and height. I did request a different bow color but they were unable to meet the request. It was okay though because the bow was really cheap and hard to tie so I ended up buying another belt to match the skirt and cover the elastic waistband. As others have said, the elastic makes the skirt fit more comfortably but it's not cute at all and must be covered. As for the quality, I was pleasantly surprised. The tulle was not cheap and soft and better quality than I expected. The silhouette was just like in the photo - true A-line and fluffy. When it arrived, it was all compact and possibly wrinkly, but I sprayed it with Static Guard and hung it up over night before I needed to wear it and it was perfect. I got so many compliments and I felt darling in it. The color was bright and cheery as I hoped too! I definitely recommend this listing for good quality inexpensive tulle skirts and I myself will be purchasing another color soon. I knocked off one star because of the frustrating communication process (at first) and for the poor quality of the bow. Had it not been for that, I would have given them 5 stars. Thank you!
summary: Darling Staple Tulle Skirt For Spring/Summer

Nice belt.  Yet a problem.  You cut back on the belt at opposite side of curved end to provide for a shorter length. However, if you cut off too much, you're unable to latch the belt b.c. the "grooved" cut-outs to which the belt attaches do not reach the tip or near tip of the curved part of the belt. I cut off 4 inches to allow the curved end to more neatly fit into pant belt loops. Now, however, belt won't latch until I probably attain a size 28-inch waist which ain't going to happen.  In my judgment, curved end is excessively long, at least for my taste.  The solution is for the manufacturer to extend the groves two inches prior to tip of curved end of belt.  As purchased, grooved cuts are a full 5-inches from curved tip end of belt.  Now need to purchase new curved belt sans buckle.  Word to wise.  FYI to all.
summary: Careful with cut back in length

reviewText: Just as advertised. I love it.

Update:
The small latch piece inside broke today (it snapped in two) , about a year after purchase.  I only wear the belt on weekends, so it probably wouldn't have lasted that long with everyday use.  Before that, it was good.

Original:
I really like this ratchet belt - especially since the release mechanism is a push button, which makes disengagement easier than on another belt I own that has a small lever.  My hope is that it lasts longer than my conventional belts, which fall apart rather quickly.

The caveat on this one is that you have to make sure that you don't cut it too short.  I thought mine was cut at a medium length, but I came very near to clipping too much for first slot to catch the ratchet.  As a result, I can't set it too loose otherwise it won't catch.

The only downside to this product is that it smelled very strongly of "moldy grass clippings" in spite of its nice packaging.  I had to scrub it down and the odor seemed to thankfully dissipate.
summary: Nice ratchet belt, but broke within a year

The others are that it fits nicely and the print is pretty, although not nearly as nice as it looks in the pictures. Again, the dress looks cheaply made. The belt is a joke, it can barely be called a belt since it doesn't come with anything to hold it in place. Wearing it kind of ruins the dress instead of giving a nice effect. Here are some pictures for you to see for yourselves. To me, these kind of details are the touches that define the quality of a garment and hence I'm giving it 2 stars. The price is not bad,but honestly you can get a better quality dress for the same price at H&M, for instance. Just don't buy it

Description in order of photos. 1. Notice the top is not nearly as gathered as the picture shows, clearly not enough fabric was used.
2. If you look closely you can see the black hair in the top seam on the inside, it was sent to me like this! First thing I saw when I opened the bag! Ew!!! Btw... I'm blonde, definitely not mine.
3. It's basically a small fabric tube. Absolutely NO flowy-ness or swing in the skirt of the dress.
4. It is see through. The pic the seller provided shows a lined dress, in fact the third of sellers pics shows the models feet, and if you look at the hemline you can see the dress has ankle length lining.

reviewText: Loving this silk scarf.  I ordered the black scarf, and it is so very soft and pretty! I'm including a picture, but that really doesn't do it justice. The scarf is very large, which makes it versatile because it can be worn in so many ways. The fabric is soft and light with a subtle sheen to it. It is warm, but lightweight, and it absolutely floats when I move. When it arrived, it came with a pretty gift bag, and it had many creases from being folded. I think it with a little steam, and these creases fell away easily. I have a feeling this will get a lot of use as part of my work wardrobe this winter.

This scarf is huge!! Very light and sheer. Could be used for a dress up night out. Not for keeping you warm tho. The black seems to be a little light, or maybe a tinge of Brown mixed in. Not sure, but could be a blacker black. Is it silk? I guess so, but seems more like another fabric to me. However, keep in mind I'm no silk expert. It is very pretty and I'll use it often. It has quality stitching and came well packaged.

The black scarf is absolutely beautiful! It feels very soft and so smooth. I really like that it has a slight sheen but it's not shiny or shimmery at all. I used it as a long scarf with a fancy dress and oh-la-la, so nice! I got a lot of compliments on this scarf. The edges are completely finished on all 4 sides. It hangs very well and evenly with no sagging. It could easily be folded it in half like a shawl and would look very pretty like that. It's also large enough (78 x 52) to wear as a sarong or a cover up but much too sheer to wear as a dress alone. I am pleased that this scarf came with the tag hanging on a string from the discreet label and not the scarf itself. No chance of snags or holes which has been a real problem for me with scarves from other online sources. It came with a reusable carry bag. I did not pay full price for this item. I take my reviews seriously and hope you find this one helpful.
summary: The black scarf is absolutely beautiful! It feels very soft and so smooth.

reviewText: This scarf is a great size! Large enough to use as a shawl and soft and flowy enough to use as a regular scarf. The material is super soft and very luxurious feeling. I am looking forward to using this scarf this winter. I love that it is extra long and can be wrapped several times to make it look like a thicker more heavy scarf. The scarf is a sheer material and I chose the black color. This scarf will go with everything from casual to dressy. I also received a very nice reusable grocery bag and a beaded slide bracelet with blue and white beads. What a nice unexpected bonus. I am impressed with this scarf and the company that makes such a great item available.  I am so impressed with this scarf I will be purchasing more to give as gifts.
summary: Such great quality and size for a beautiful scarf

reviewText: Horrible strange unnatural material

When I saw the picture of this summer blouse, I knew I had to get it. However, when I saw the sizing chart, I immediately felt wary. I am a very short woman at 5"0, weigh 130 pounds and I normally wear a B cup bra. Why is this information relevant? Because I had to get this top in a XX-Large according to its chart...and I have never gotten any shirt larger than a Medium in my life. Take note that this is the biggest size this company offers for this particular top. Anyway, it took several days to get here, but sooner than the estimated time.

Once I put on the blouse, I was pleased that the rich wine color was exactly as pictured. The fabric is very nice and smooth to the touch, but I would say it would be way too hot to wear in the summer. Perfect for fall or wintertime, though. One drawback that I noticed is that the shirt felt slightly tight around my shoulders, but it still looked rather flattering for my figure. I think this would look great with dark leggings or skinny jeans, but it would make you look more plump with baggier pants.

So in conclusion, I think this blouse is worth the price but only if you are on the thin side or don't have a large chest. Otherwise, you will end up disappointed.

I received this product at a discount but this does not affect my review in any way.
summary: Lovely blouse...but only for smaller women!

I wear scarves nearly every day. I just like a dash of color to finish out an outfit. While the quality of this scarf isn't stellar, its perfect for the price. What I love best is the length of the scarf. Even after rapping around my neck once, the ends still reach to just above my knees. I love that. I bought the wine colored scarf. I wore skinny black pants, black T, and a leather jacket with this scarf around my neck and some big earrings. It was incredibly dramatic. I am now thinking about buying a few more colors.

I LOVE this scarf! I purchased the Wine Red color which is gorgeous and vivid just like I had hoped based on the picture on Amazon. The fabric is light, soft and smooth, just as you would expect from silk.  It is sheer if you spread the scarf out fully, and it appears more opaque when gathered together around the neck.  It is simply a stunning scarf. It is also large enough that I can wrap it around my neck and the ends fall most of the way down my torso; it is generously sized.  It feels truly luxurious and looks stylish and elegant.  I'm completely pleased and have no complaints. I was glad to have a chance to purchase this product at a discount in return for my taking the time to write a thorough and honest review. I rely heavily on reviews written by others for most of my purchasing decisions so I take this very seriously and will update my review if my opinion changes. If you found this review helpful, please let me know below; I try to write reviews that will help others make informed purchasing decisions and I pay attention to your feedback. Thanks for reading!

reviewText: Absolutely beautiful look and feel. I wore it for a trip on the river and was the only person sans sunburn by the end. Get it wet to keep cool or just cover up to keep shaded. It was a little bit of heaven in Hells Canyon. It was also extra warmth at night in camp. If you are going floating or camping get one! they take up no space to pack and provide protection from both heat and cold. It was a horrible grey when I got home from all the smoke and dirt but it washed up beautifully. Everyone made fun of me for the first couple of days (called it my beach burka) but by the third day people were asking to try it.  I am back to buy more and will probably give them to family members for X-mas. It looks a little elegant for camping but that just adds to the joy of wearing it ;)

reviewText:
So far I absolutely love my scarves from Ysiop. I purchased their smaller scarf and this one as something more substantial. This scarf is very large, but very lightweight. It will be perfect for a park or a beach or even to protect the neck on a chilly day.

It's thoughtfully packaged, in a plastic bag, then in a thin plastic bag, plus, there's a fabric bag in the package for storing - great idea! Besides, they put a little gift in the package - a bracelet with ceramic beads, very bohemian. My toddler was so happy to get it. ;)

Some reviewers mentioned that the scarf got ruined after a wash. That might be just me, but I never wash silk in a machine - only hand wash - and I've never had a ruined garment or accessory. But I'll update the review if anything goes wrong with this one. ;)
This is a great scarf and totally served its purpose. I wore it in the middle of the desert, whilst hiking, and needing to cover my head and shoulders. It was a little hot, but airy enough.

It was ruined after 1 wash. Somehow it looks like it was sprayed with oil? Like it has dotted discoloration all over it.

But the size is great.
Like on the pic.aybe just a tad bit darker. Silky material. Not so thin. Soft. And large, as described.

Silk is graded based on winding, size, tenacity, elongation, evenness, cleanness, neatness, and cohesion. This scarf falls short in all categories. It is very light weight chiffon with uneven silk threads. I suspect that the threads would pull very easily over time. I returned it immediately.
summary: I suspect that the threads would pull very easily over time

This is a very pretty lingerie set, but the fit is a little strange. I ordered the size L going by the sizing chart. I am 5'7", 155 lbs, a size 12, and bra size 34DD. The "bra" portion of this set is made small. There was absolutely no support and the cups were nowhere near big enough to fit my breasts. However, the lacy portion under the bra part was wayyyy too big. It kind of just hung there. It wasn't form fitting at all like in the photo. I suppose ideally I would need an XXL in the breast portion and a M or even a S in the rest of the dress. I think this is just a simple design flaw and that maybe this set isn't made for women with my shape. Not everyone is made the same, so this is definitely understandable. All things considered, this is an absolutely gorgeous set. The embroidery on the lace is absolutely stunning. The amount of detail in the design of this set is simply fantastic. The dress portion has slits that go all the way up to the bust which made this comfortable, sexy, breathable, and very forgiving to the imperfect figure. There is basically nothing to the g-string panty that comes with this set, but I guess that's kind of the point, right? Overall this is a beautiful set, I just wish it were made to fit my figure so I could enjoy it a little more.

I received this item at a discounted price in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. The opinions listed here are my own, and the discount I received had no bearing on me review of this product.

reviewText: Already wrote a product review, love this scarf. Here is a picture. I love when people do this so you can see what it looks like on.

Oh my goodness this is absolutely stunning. I love how flowy it is. It looks just like it did in the product description photos, but prettier if possible. I would want to wear this all the time if I wasn't worried about it getting snags. Now, I haven't tested the sunscreen ability claims of the scarf and quite frankly I don't plan to. I would be really surprised if it worked and I personally have no desire to become a crispy critter in the name of science so I will just stick with sunscreen for now. I will post a photo the first time I wear it outside of the house, but these are so gorgeous that I am tempted to order one in every color. I feel completely comfortable recommending this product. I do however, agree with one other reviewer that this doesn't feel like most silk scarves, but it is so pretty that I really don't care about that. I will update my review if my opinion of or experience with the product changes at any point in time. Oh, and in case the information doesn't show up above my review, I bought the Emerald Green scarf.
Amazing! Color is much better in real - very rich.

I wouldn't normally pay so  much for a scarf, but this is worth it if you like scarves. Packaged well and they included extra bonuses (bracelet and cloth carrying bag) that I didn't expect. The cloth is very uniform (no bulges in the threads and no gaps in the weave) and overall feels soft and light. It is also very large, so getting the look as shown in the pictures is easy.

[...]

The scarf I purchased is simply beautiful.  It is a perfect jewel green.  It came packaged neatly folded with it's own storage bag.  I've not had the chance to wear it out but have played around tieing it different ways.  It has wonderful movement.  I can't wait to get another!

First off, I just ADORE this scarf. I haven't had the chance to wear it yet, but the brightness and depth of the green color is absolutely stunning.

Its a truly BIG scarf. Its nearly 80 long, almost 6  feet, by 4 feet wide. This is a substantial amount of fabric to work with, and can be turned into an almost endless array of accessories: shawl, shrug, halter top, head scarf, etc. with a little creative knotting.

This really is 100% silk, not silk polyester or nylon. Its pretty thin, so its rather see-through. I see this as an asset, rather than a deterrent; it creates less bulk around the neck.

Spend the extra money for silk scarves, rather than imitations. Silk has a warmth and durability that you don't find with artificial fibers. I wash my silk scarves in a sink of warm water and hair conditioner. Pick a smell you like, it doesnt matter what kind of conditioner. Rinse well, roll in a bath towel to blot out moisture, and hang to dry. Handle silk gently when its wet and it will last you your entire life.

I received a sample of this product to evaluate so I could provide an unbiased review, but I would have paid full price for this product, I like it so much. If you have any questions about my experience with this product, please feel free to ask in the comments. If you found my review helpful, let me know!

you'll need to cut the mouth piece larger out towards the outer edge of the eyes for a more screen accurate appearance. I also added foam to the interior for a better fit ...filled out gaps. sprayed with plasti dip. with a little modification it is a great looking cowl.

reviewText:
Definitely worth the money if you're willing to put in a little work to improve it.

I cut out the mouth and sprayed the whole this with plastidip and it looks amazing!

Still need to figure out a way to pad the inside near the back of my head to make it fit a little better but overall I'm really happy with it.

For $45, it's actually a pretty good quality mask. However, it DOES requires some TLC. It's going to need a layer of plexidip, as the latex was not cleaned or treated after being pulled. It runs a tad big (which is fine for me, as someone with a sizable melon). And you have to cut out the mouth piece. And I will be adding a zipper to the back, as the back opens as flaps. But, for $45, these are not horrible inconvenient things.
Long story short, for someone on a budget, this is a great cowl.
summary: Great Quality Cowl for the price

reviewText: This not a bad cowl for the price. It comes packaged in a very small cardboard box so you should blow a balloon up inside upon opening it. It also needs a little help with paint so all I did was lightly go over it with black spray paint. Also adding velcro to the back helps close the seam. This definitely beats buying the rubies mask. If you don't want to spend $200 on a cowl and still want the doj look then you can't beat this price.
summary: Works good for my halloween costume

reviewText: I bought this mask for fan film it was good quality but when it was too big for the actors head. :(

I can barely give this 4 stars. While it is clearly a Dawn of Justice cowl, and cheaper than most other cowls out there, unfortunately in this sense you get what you pay for. There are blemishes and pinholes all throughout and it just looks crude. The inside also smells terrible. It also came stuffed in a small box with no protection which creased it and bent it so it became misshapen. The eyes are a bit too small and you have to cut the mouth hole out yourself which I found personally to be tedious and a bit aggravating. Not to mention that as a whole it is far too big. It's decent for the price I guess but it definitely needs some work
summary: Recieved a poor quality cowl, but it'll do

reviewText: Pretty good, a very big mask though. Fixed easily with some foam behind the head to make it a good fit. Mouth hole is still a little big though. But, overall the price is very good. Check out the pics for the final product. Mouth area removed very easily with scissors. Finally, the part that sticks down from the neck and into to the chest was not symmetrical to the mask, I had to cut it off. See the original mask vs my mask to understand what i mean. Mask is split in back, which is helpful to take on and off. Update:Mask chin area filled after wearing a balaclava underneath the mask. Helps a ton.
summary: Pretty good, a very big mask though

reviewText: Way to big

Just barely gets 5 stars. Has a few issues out of the box. Mask came folded with no bubble wrap or anything in the cardboard box to keep it protected. The first thing I did was blow up a balloon inside it and let it sit overnight. This worked wonders to give the mask it's shape back. Cutting out the mouth area was easy enough. I'll need to make slightly bigger eye holes and will plasi-dip the mask black since the latex color was faded and has a few gray blemish smears from dust or whatever. The overall look on this is very solid with no unwanted areas of floppy material. The shoulder area sits well also and the price was right. I noticed that the waist was a little higher and I preferred the low rise waist of the briefs with no fly, but this was not a game changer. Also, I would have liked that these come in black but could not find them in that color.

After a single wash I noticed they shrunk but the waist band still felt comfortable enough to wear. After a full days use I couldn't wait to pull these off. Unlike the Bamboo briefs with no fly, these have a seam right down the back side. Guess where that seam decided to wedge itself all day long!!! Don't know that i can return these, so they are now my, "last resort, all out of other briefs," briefs. LoL

I just gave birth to my socond child and my fingers got so swollen i wasn't able to wear my wedding ring. I am still unable to get it on my finger, so i bought this in a half size up and it is perfect. After my fingers go back to their normal size, i''ll be able to wear it on my other hand. I have another ring i have worn for the last 6 or 7 years, but will be replacing it with this one on that finger. The ring is very shiny and looks like it will last a very long time without getting dull or beat up. I purchased this blouse because I was looking for something that I can wear to work and because of how unique the collar design is. The collar is fluted or scalloped and thus automatically draws people attention to the neckline. The seller has many different color options and I decided to purchase the blue-green. The color is exactly as depicted in the picture. The blouse arrived just as expected, the blouse was a greenish color that can be used for almost any occasion. The fabric of the blouse is extremely soft on your skin and is made of a blend of 95% Rayon and 5% Spandex. The collar of the blouse is uniquely shaped, it has rounded edges that look really attractive compared to my other blouses. However to be honest, the shirt is slightly too low cut for my personal taste. It dips low so I like wearing a camisole underneath and place a cute sweater cardigan on top. Because of the design, it can be worn for either work or regular casual days. It is really elegant looking when worn with a nice cardigan or jacket. You can wear the shirt with a camisole underneath and some leggings for a casual look or with dress slack for a professional look. Wearing the blouse is extremely comfortable and can be casual or dressy. I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion.

This tie first off is the width that I like to wear it's between the two fits(slim and traditional). It still has somewhat of a classic look to it so you can wear it to a fancy dinner party yet it's stylish enough to wear it casually with a button up and jeans. I'll probably buy another one from this company in the near future. Thanks Ysiop!

reviewText:
This lace tube peplum tube top is cute. I ordered it in Royal, which is a pretty blue. The fabric this top is made from is not your typical lace. It is pretty, but not the dainty lace that I tend to expect. The back of the shirt is a ruched type thing that allows for some stretch.
I am about 56.5 tall and 135-140 pounds. I ordered this top in a large based on the measurements in the description. I am a 34D in bra sizes. This top fits well in the bust. I wear a sticky backless strapless type bra and then use some bra tape to hold the shirt to my skin to keep it from slipping. The shirt is cute and fits fairly well, but I wish it was longer. The peplum section starts higher up than it does on my other peplum type shirts and when the bottom goes down to just below the top of my pants. Overall, this shirt is okay. If the length was better, I would like it a lot more. The color and fabric are great and the fit across the bust is perfect, which is rare in strapless clothes.

I received a discount on this product in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

First, the size issue:  I could see from the size chart that this top would run extremely small so I ordered a 3X when I really wanted an XL and that was the correct decision.  Next, the length:  if you are 5 feet 4 inches tall, this top will practically touch your knees!!  It was a very frumpy length which made it look more like a nightshirt or a great-grandma's housedress.  My solution was to cut off the entire border on the bottom to get the correct length for me.  I used the fabric to make a scarf!!  Next, the cheesy strings that tie the keyhole neckline together:  I tied a knot and chopped off most of the strings and only left a short length which is not too noticeable.  Once I finished "customizing" this top, I ended up with a comfy shirt which will never wrinkle or shrink.

I am 5'2" & around 160 lbs. with a moderate to ample sized bust and I ordered the XL. For me, it fit just the way I like it. (Not too loose, but loose enough so I don't feel self conscious about my lack of washboard abs, lol!) If you're around my size, but prefer to wear your tees a bit tighter, you may wish to go with a large instead. Since we have hardwood and tile floors in our home, our kids are always taking their socks off so they won't slip and winding up with freezing cold feet. Most socks with grips on the bottom come in packs of one or two and cost the same as what five pairs of Yantus cost. They came packaged together and were delivered really quickly. They have adorable little animals faces on them that my three year old thought was just the coolest. They fit right at the ankle and that worried me a little since socks are always coming off of little feet, but these have a tiny little band around the ankle that is sewn just slightly tighter and so far they stay in place. The grips seem to work just as they should on our hardwood floors. Believe me when I say that my daughter had worked them to death "testing" them out! They've been washed twice and are holding up quite well! All grippies are still in place! I did receive these socks for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased review... but I will likely buy another set when the time comes!

I bought these socks for my 13 month old. She isn't walking yet but is pulling up on things and is starting to think about taking those first steps. We have hardwood floors through out our house. So I worry about her slipping if she's barefooted or wearing socks with no grippers. These little socks have lots of little grippers on the bottoms of them. I love that they are no show. So my daughter can wear them with her shoes too and be stylish. This set comes with 5 pairs. We got frogs and bunnies and bees and ducks. They are so cute. They also seem to stay on her feet really well. Which is not a normal thing for my baby. She is always losing her socks. But these stay put. I'm very happy with my purchase. I recommend them to any mom who has a baby that will be walking soon.
I received this item at a discount for my honest opinion.
summary: Cute baby gripper socks with animal faces

reviewText: Love it. Exactly what I expected.

Women's Sleeveless Tunic Dress
By MSSHE

In the past year my weight has not changed but it has definitely shifted around ( not in places I want it). So with that happening and the fact that I am disabled, I am always looking for new comfortable clothes. Were I live we have very hot summers and I thought that this was so cute and versatile.

I was so happy when this arrived. It is way more comfortable than I expected. I mean very Comfortable!! The dress is made out of Ninety-Five percent Cotton and Five percent Spandex. I am sure this is partly why it feels the way it does on. It is also stretchy with the perfect amount of give. The stitching is also top notch and no string hanging around.

I added my belt to it and wore it with Bling Flip Flops. I can also wear my cowboy boots and a western belt and if I could wear high heel shoes-sandals that would look great too. I just love how flexible/versatile this dress is.

To sum it up, I love the comfort and the versatility of this dress and rate it Five Stars!!!!!

I received this product at a discount in exchange for an honest review. I received no financial compensation. My review is based solely on my personal experiences with the product and are my opinions alone. I have no affiliation with the seller or the manufacture.
