reviewText:
These bracelets are very good quality for the price.  They have that good leather smell too, not like the cheap knock off stuff at Hot Topic.

They are nice and soft on the inside and on the edges.  The snaps are attached well and seem very secure.  I actually think mine look a little better than the ones in the photo, and I'm sure with wear they'll look even better.

One thing of note:  mine measured at 7.5" - 8.5" when snapped, which was fine for me but probably won't be for everybody.  So keep that in mind.  Both were just over 1.75" wide as well.

I was fortunate to receive these bracelets at a discount, provided I was honest and unbiased in my review,  and I'm glad I did :)

I love a good cuff bracelet, especially softer ones like leather that stay put on my small wrist and not slide around or get in the way all day. These fit that need pretty well.

I love that it is a 2 pack...brown or black will go with anything.

The leather is pretty soft although a little stiff around the edges, but knowing leather, I think that will soften up with some wear.

Nice design. They have interest with the layer of leather plus the metal details. Not too much that a guy cannot wear it but more than just a plain band.

Adjustable. It has 2 snaps, which is really nice. It fits my larger framed husband (he is 6'9") a little snug but still comfortably, as well as my smaller 5'6" frame. I have quite small wrist and they are a little loose but not enough where the whole bracelet spins.

Unisex. Works for both my husband and myself.

Great price for a 2 pack of nice bracelets. We like to go to our local Renaissance Faire every year and as soon as I pulled them out my husband said that they look like great Ren Faire attire. I will probably get a second set so each of use can wear a set on both wrists come RenFaire time. Disclosure: I was fortunate enough to be approved to review these at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. I do a LOT of online shopping with 4 little kids and rely heavily on the reviews of others for my purchases so I strive to leave helpful reviews to assist others. I hope this has helped you in your purchasing decision. Thank you for reading!
summary: Great set of unisex leather bracelets, adjustable, nice design, comfortable

reviewText:

I'm never sure about ordering leather products. I've had some pretty poor quality leather sent my way so I was happy to discover that these bracelets are supple and feel nice against my wrists. There are two snaps so these bracelets can fit smaller wrists or larger ones.
The bracelets come in a nice cloth bag, which I gave to my mom for her to re-purpose as a jewelry bag when she travels.
I received a discount for this product in exchange for my honest and unbiased review - something I take very seriously. I also do not blather on about products just to "up" my word count. I see no reason to waste your time when I can give an honest review succinctly.

reviewText: perfect

After my facebook feed blew up with all my friends and aquaintances selling LuLaRoe tops and leggings, I was itching for a comparable look with out the hefty price tag that the LLR Perfect, Classic, and Irma tees carried with them.
After I picked out a more affordable pair of fun printed leggings here on Amazon, I began hunting for an affordable, tunic-length style top to pair with them. I am happy to say this top covered ALL the bases.
Fit: For reference I am 5'4", measure 40"-33"-44", 10/12 pant size, top size large, 36D bust. I chose the 2XL that corresponded to my measurements on the size chart.
- material flows nicely over my figure with out being baggy
- TRUE tunic-length: this top covers my butt nicely and THEN some, even when lifting my arms.
- silky soft material that washes well in cold water. It's best to hang this to dry.
- slimmer-fit sleeve. I have thick upper arms, and while the sleeves did not have any extra room, the material is soft and stretchy the sleeves are not at all uncomfortable.
- cute back-strap detail to add interest to the neck line.
This affordable top is the perfect length for leggings, but soft enough to be worn as nightshirt to bed, or even as a swimuit cover up!
summary: A more affordable alternative to LuLaRoe tunics and tees!

reviewText: Giving them to my sister.

DESCRIPTION: The product was described a very fashionable item that every woman needs in her closet to match and accessorize. I enjoyed seeing the Made in the USA patch on the packaging. It makes me happy to support an American-made, created, and/or distributed product.
The packaging is so nice and professional. When my mom came over and visited, she saw the product sitting on my dresser, in the closet of my master bedroom, and she thought that I had spent hundreds of dollars at the high-end stores buying the most expensive clothing and accessory products. She was so surprised when I told her that I had received a very good deal on Amazon! Shopping through Amazon, especially having a Prime membership, is really a good deal.

PRO: The product came as described. The packaging is very nice and professional. It looks like something I could have bought at a high-end store. The product is wrapped nicely in a bag to keep it from getting wet or torn during the shipping process. The bag, itself, does not have that bad, musty smell that some products have that I have bought off some competing sellers on Amazon.
I love the company and brand because they are made in the USA, which is very important to me, because then I know that the product is of the highest quality). I did not need to contact the seller because there were no issues with the purchasing of the product, the shipment time, the price, or the products end results. I would highly recommend this item to my friends and family. If you are torn between buying this and another similar product, please purchase this one, regardless of the price point difference. The clothing and accessories can be worn during the day, while I am a teacher, and at night, when I go out with my friends.

CON: The product is not a named brand, so if using a product with a known name that is important to you, then perhaps this product is not for you. I know that some people get hung-up on name brands and it prevents them from getting out of their proverbial comfort zone and trying new things that they might enjoy. Personally, receiving and trying a product that has not been tried by my friends is a new concept to me, but I am an adventurous person who likes to try new things, like traveling solo around western and eastern Europe, moving to South Korea without knowing any of the language, culture, or people. So buying a product that has a brand name that I have never heard of, that none of my friends have ever used, and I have not seen on a store rack, might scare some people, but it does not bother me.

SUMMARY: I have been wearing similar products for over 10 years, since I was a teenager and I realized that I needed to wear high-quality clothing and accessories on my body. I have been searching for this similar type of product for a while. I would say that this product ranks right up there with products at two, three, or four times the price. I would recommend this product to my friends, family, coworkers, and you! Thanks for reading! Please note that I received the product for free or at a discount, however my reviews are my own words.

reviewText:
I ordered the womans long tassels cardigan sunscreen beach cover up for my daughter. The package arrived and it was in an envelope, which was fine I like the fact that they did not over do the packaging. I received the product within 2 days of ordering. It is sheer with embellishments on the neckline and tassels at the bottom. It does not come close to being able to close in the front, but it is functional. She did not like it so much as a cover up for the beach, she likes to wear it with jeans, skirts, shorts and dresses. It is a very versatile piece. The material is polyester, its sheer and very breathable, so its great on hot days. The material is strong, my daughter actually got it caught on a door handle while walking out of our home and it did not tear, which I was surprised since it does seem like a delicate piece. This is a beautiful must have for your wardrobe, but even though it says one size it is truly a small. My daughter is very tall and thin and it fits her perfectly. I think the verbiage for one size should be changed and it should be listed as just small, I think the one size is a bit misleading. I would recommend this product, it is beautiful, quality made, strong material. A tip, we washed this by hand, and flat dried to prevent any tangling of the tassels and to avoid any issues with shrinkage.
If after reading my review of this product or any of my other reviews and interesting or useful please rate it is as "helpful" or leave a comment. I truly enjoy writing reviews on products that will potentially help someone make an informed decision based on my experience.

The colors in the ribbon that runs along the edges stand out a little more than I had hoped, so just make sure that you're expecting that (see close ups of black color). I will say, when it arrive, it smelled terrible, kind of like bad patchouli, but the scent did come out in the first wash.
I did receive this product at a discount for an unbiased review, but that has not swayed my opinion in the slightest. I think it's a great purchase!

I ordered the Women's Long Tassels Cardigan Sunscreen Beach Cover Up and was thrilled with the product that I received. The product was shipped so quickly and arrived within two days of the order. The cover up is the perfect accessory for spring and summer. It is made to be worn over your bathing suit as a cover up and this is perfect for that! The material is light weight and thin, but good quality so it would not easily tear. But in addition to being worn as a cover up, it looks adorable with a tank top, skinny jeans and either sandals or flats. The details on the cover up are beautiful! The tassels along the bottom of the cover up are neatly designed and add a beautiful touch. The detail along the edge of the cover up are sewed nicely in black, green and red; they are nicely stitched and add some color to the basic top. I ordered the cover up in white which is great to match nearly anything.

I purchased this long tassels cardigan for my wife.  Our vacation by the beach house was already set and she already started procuring stuff which she needs for this vacation.  When she saw this cardigan, she said this will be perfect for that.  Also, she said this will actually have many usage, not just one time on the beach but she can also use this for casual outfits or everyday wear.  The cardigan's picture here online looked very lovely and when we got this for real, it looked just the same. My wife totally loved it!  This is a lightweight fabric but a durable material.  I am pretty sure that this will be serving her for a long time, which is really nice.  She already used this several times and had been washed and dried in the machines several times as well, and the good thing was that there were no wearing or tearing whatsoever.  The color also did not fade.  Plus points to all of its nice features. It is not that wrinkly as well as long as you get it out of the dryer the moment it is done.  Well, even though this may be lightweight, it does serve its purpose of blocking that hot rays of the sun giving you the protection you need.  It does not only block the heat but also the light cool windy breeze during spring time.  This is a multi-functional cardigan. The design was also pretty.  The tassels added more attractiveness to it.  Overall, this was such a very worthy purchase for the price and the quality of the cardigan.
I was able to get this nice product on a discount and I am happy to be able to share as well my fair and honest feedback about it.

Taking the previous reviews into account, I purchased this item 3 sizes larger than I would normally wear and it was still TOO SMALL!  It is EXTREMELY frustrating, disappointing and surprising to order items from Amazon and receive this kind of poor quality. I now have to go through the hassle of sending this blouse back to Amazon.  Going forward, it is imperative Amazon request their manufactures use the North American sizing chart.  This will immediately elevate any further concerns with sizing.  On a positive note, the color of this blouse is vibrant and clear, and it is sewn very well.  Separate from the sizing, this is a good product, the company just needs to be willing to put in the effort to use a North American sizing chart.

reviewText: This bag worked very well moving through trade shows and airports.  It stowed away nicely under the seat on the airplane.  The clasps worked better than expected.  The adjustable straps had enough of a range to find just the right fitting.  The outside pockets on each end were just the right size for cell phones.  The two pockets immediately under the flap fit my kindle perfectly and help it secure.  Inside were three compartments that were suitable for file size folders, note pads and the center compartment had a velcro enclosure to secure a smaller laptop or to keep your confidential files segregated.  I have a very large laptop that fit VERY snugly in one of the larger compartments for transport through the airport.  It would not be practical for daily use as a laptop bag with a 17" screen size.
summary: It stowed away nicely under the seat on the airplane

reviewText: They have very sturdy frames ... but for me, their nicest feature is that they are pretty dark lenses. Living in Sunny-Florida it is extremely bright during the day. Being 100% 'polarized' gives your eyes and vision the protection they need in very bright sunlight. At about $23 ... they are comparably priced for the good quality sunglasses that they are.

These are really sleek. I wasn't sure how they would look on me, but I love them. They are nice and dark, which is great for highly sensitive eyes, but not tacky mirror shades. THey seem very unisex to me, but not sure why they specify these are for men. I think they  are a good size and style for a woman. These are far better than you would expect for the price. I have bought cheap glasses as well as designer. These are more like designer except the price is lower.  It is one of those products that exceeds your expectations. The style is modern, minimalist, and they are well made from what I can tell. It comes in a very nice case.  I love that there is no logo on the frames since I don't often buy products that make me advertise for them. I have several pairs of sunglasses because I lose them so often. I have managed not to lose these, probably I wear these on certain occasions, with certain outfits, so don't where them all the time.  Very happy with this purchase. I was offered this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review!
summary: but I love them. They are nice and dark

reviewText:
I generally don't write reviews on products I purchase but I was quite impressed with this wallet. I can't comment on the durability because i've only had it for a couple of weeks, but it looks and feels like a very well made slim wallet. The stitching is very neat and compliments the overall color of the wallet. The leather material looks clean and has a nice feel, not hard and inflexible, but not too soft and flimsy either.
Other wallets boast of their "slim" feature, but they're really only slim when empty tend to bulk up as cards and cash are added. What I appreciate most about this Ikepod is that it stays in its "slim" genre even when cash and cards are added. It almost seems as if its unable to get big :) . I think it's the way the wallet is designed combined with the texture of the leather material. And by maintaining its slim feature, it's also a very comfortable "front pocket wallet". Fair price for a very well made wallet. Good job Ikepod.
Addition: I strongly suggest that Ikepod increase the color selection on this wallet. Army green, Java, Tan, Burnt Orange, would be very nice color additions.
summary: Fair price for a very well made wallet. Color: cocoa

ScotteVest Hoodie-Cotton.  I have several ScotteVest products including their SEV Jacket with liner, and 2 pairs of their Hidden Cargo pants.  Great for traveling light...  The items are all made of quality materials and very well designed.  I am still amazed at how much gear I can put in the pockets and still the jacket hangs normally and does not look like your pockets are bulging.  Airlines put limits on carry-on luggage sizes, but you are free to bring a jacket, and the ScotteVest allows you to stuff all those wonderful pockets full of things that you would normally have to stuff in your carry-on bag...and an overstuffed carry-on can attract attention of the airlines at boarding  Even in warm weather, I like to bring a jacket and will wear my ScotteVest Jacket and take it off in the airport if it's too warm.  After I go through security, I transfer all the excess items into the jacket pockets to board the plane.  I can leave the items in the ScotteVest jacket or transfer them to my carry-on during the flight or when I land.

My new ScotteVest Hoodie and SEV Jacket shell will be going with me on my trip to Germany, Austria and Switzerland this fall and give me great flexibilty to how I dress for the weather.  I do not check any bags and everything I need must fit in my carry-on bags.  After being an on-the-road consultant for several years, I know the importance of packing light and all the ScotteVest products are designed for traveling light, and also eliminates the need for a Day Pack for your daily tours and adventures.
summary: Love all the ScotteVest products...just wish they were a little cheaper.

I did order a size up which was recommended and I'm glad I did. The design is very vibrant and much different than my basic yoga leggings that I wear. These are extremely comfortable and very breathable. They aren't so thick that they become sticky on you once you start sweating during a workout. They are perfect for working out or even just wearing around the house doing chores or just lounging around. I'm happy with the quality of these and they are very affordable too which is always a factor I look at. *discount received for testing and review*

Product is fairly much as pictured although I am unsure that it is actually leather.  But it is dressy and has a nice look anyways.  I purchased this for my granddaughter to wear with her dresses to add a little flare and accentuate her neck.  This choker seems to be made fairly well and will work well with all colors of clothing as it is black in color and black goes with anything.  I think I may have ordered one size too big, but maybe it will fit better as she grows.  It does flatter her and her clothing a bit better and she seemed to be actually pleased with the choker.  Id say it makes her look a little classier than usual and looks better than a bare neck.  It came nicely packaged within a reasonable amount of time.  It is adjustable with a nice golden heart clasp which adds to the classy look.  It is lightweight enough not to be uncomfortable and easy to wipe down if needed.  I may need to order another one or two in the future for my other granddaughters.
I purchased the choker at a reduced price for my review and honest, unbiased opinion.  I am not affiliated with the seller or manufacturer of this product.  I hope this review has been a little helpful.

reviewText: I ordered this for my teenage daughter who doesn't wear much jewelry other than earrings. So when it arrived she instantly fell in love with it. The little bow on it is so cute, it can also be slide along the choker so you can choose to have it right in the center or off to the side. I'm not certain if it's genuine leather, looks more like a pleather material. Either way I'm really happy with it so it doesn't really matter. The length was the perfect length to fit around her neck comfortably. The clasp is gold toned & has a lobster claw clasp, if need you could easily add extra chain or rings to lengthen it no problem. Once she tried it one she wore it the rest of the day & the next day too, I think this will become a regular part of her wardrobe. *Disclaimer* I received this item at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest review. The packaging is nice and straight-forward. Very high end and elegant looking. The shipment came in fast from Amazon. Please change your sizing, Mango! Not all Americans are fat!

reviewText:
We love these chiffon bows, probably because we don't have anything else quite so girlie and fluffy as these!  I have three little princesses all under the age of five (because I'm crazy mostly) and so we have a tendency to buy headbands like they are going out of style, which they aren't.  Can I tell you I found one in my gym bag yesterday and in my underwear drawer the day before that?  That's life with three little minions.  ;p  We love the extra girlie factor that this bring to our collection and these are the first chiffon set we have owned, which is sort of like tulle used in a tutu but much, much softer.

We love the color variety that came in our little kit as well as the sizing and stretch to them.  My daughters, eighteen months, two and a half year and almost five years old, all fit into these headbands, as did my neighbor when we had wine night last night and we got a little on the tipsy slash drunk side.  (PS - She looked ADORABLE).  I'd recommend these for any little girl who a bow addition, and also for my 30 year old neighbor.  ;p

I was not compensated in exchange for my review but I did purchase this at a discount or I received it for free so I could provide an unbiased and honest review.  All opinions are my own and are the direct result of my personal interactions with the item.  :)
summary: So cute!  And super fluffy and soft to boot.

reviewText:
I am a huge fan of no show liner socks! I wear them practically every day so I feel like I am always buying them. I like that this is 3 pack because more is always better! They are nice and soft and feel comfy on my feet. I wear size 10 shoes and this were a bit snug. After I wore them for a while they did feel better. I feel like my toes are wearing out faster then some of my other socks that I have.
I like that these do have a grippy on the heal. It really helps the sock stay where it needs to. The really are 'no show' so I like that.
I would recommend these to anyone looking for a decent pair of no show liner socks.

* I received this product at a discounted price for my honest and unbiased review. I would leave the same review if I have purchased at full price.

I love no show socks! I wear flats, slip ons and Sperry's very often and I am not a fan of wearing them without socks. I always need more socks. I received the opportunity to review these at a discount in exchange for my review. Upon arrival I was kind of skeptical if they would fit, I wear a size 8.5-9 in women's and they came with cardboard that looked about like a size 7. I tried them on for size and they were perfect! The fit around the heal great and didn't slip off. Had a good grip on the heal, but not too tight, just right. They also fit my toes perfectly, I like these because they don't cover too much to the top of the foot so I could wear these with flats or even heels that come close to the toe. Great socks! Very happy with this purchase and to add these socks to my sock drawer!

I was offered the opportunity to review these socks at a reduced price for my honest opinion. I ordered these socks in gray and they in a three pack came as pictured.  I usually wear a womens size 7.5 - 8 and these fit very comfortably.  The material is a mixed cotton that is a medium to lightweight.  So far it hasn't been hot enough out for my feet to really sweat, so I cant attest to its ability to stay cool but they were comfortable.  But they are comfortable, and the heel grips do help keep the sock on and not slip off the heel like some of the other brands of no show socks often do.  They washed well in the washing machine and have held up after a couple of wears. Overall I am pretty happy with these, they cant be seen when I'm wearing my Converse and they stay put!  As stated  before I was provided this product in exchange for my honest feedback. All of my reviews are my own unbiased, honest opinions.  I do not receive monetary compensation for my feedback and I am not required to leave

reviewText:
This is a cute and comfortable "dress" but I cannot wear this out in public as a DRESS. If I did, I'd accidentally flash people everywhere! LOL. I ordered the XXL (which is what I usually wear) but it's a tad bit too small and too short (especially with the high slit in the front) causing it to be WAY too revealing for public wear. It's not so bad when standing but when sitting, it shows your underwear because it's so short in the front.

This is better worn as a long blouse with some leggings or as a nightgown / knock-around-the-house dress (for inside wear only). I'm thinking my curves also cause it to rise up even more. If I were more slender, I don't think it would be as short / high. The material is stretchy and form fitting, so I don't really like the way my mid-section looks in it (nothing some shapewear can't fix, though).

Bottom Line: I do like this, just not as a dress. You'll probably want to pair it with some leggings if you plan to wear it out (but that's just me).

A free item was provided for evaluation and unbiased review.
summary: Too revealing for my taste. Too short and super high slit in the front. Better paired with leggings.

reviewText:
This is a lightweight, casual date night kind of dress.  it is really soft and stretches making it comfortable to wear because it is made out of 95% Rayon 5% Spandex.  Don't go by Amazon size chart link, if you are not sure about your size, please choose one size up. This was a bit small for me even though I ordered a size up, needs to be more forgiving in the hips. I think if you have curves it would run small.  The pleats at the waist add a touch of style and class to the dress, followed by a flattering neckline and slit in the front. I chose classic black only because I was not sure on the neckline being too low; I was afraid I would have to wear something underneath. However, it fit fine in the breast area, and I am topheavy at a 44DD.
As for cleaning it states: Hand wash or machine wash is OK. Hand wash is recommended for long lasting quality. I machine washed mine on delicate cycle and didn't have any problems with color fading or threads coming unraveled. It remained in tact and did not shrink. I then let it air dry on a hanger.

Overall, I am highly pleased with this product, and I do highly recommend it. For its pricing, and durability you will not find a similar product for cheaper. I have tried. Believe me.

All thoughts that are expressed in my review are my own, and I never guarantee a positive outcome. I was offered this product for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased evaluation.

Wearing a tie is a very big part of my life.  Accessorizing these is just an additional way to express myself...

So I'm always looking for new tie pins, clips & bars.  I had an opportunity to receive these at a discounted price for my review and figured it was worth a shot.

Overall these are high-quality stainless steel tie clip bars.  The springs are strong enough to ensure that they are well fitting and snug.  The designs and paint that is a part of the designs are pretty solid and of high quality.  The back side of the clip is a little off center on two of them - but still within the overall frame of the bar itself so it doesn't compromise the ability of the bar to work properly.

As for packaging - they come is a nice box - but unfortunately they come 'loose' within the box - so while it's nice-ish, i still wouldn't use it as a gift box.  That being said the clip bars are nice enough to offer as a gift to workmates and family.

Final summary then - they work well and offer variety when you need to use a tie.
summary: Good value for a nice set of tie clip bars.

reviewText: This is a beautiful swimsuit, but the fit is strange.  It is too tight around the bust, and I am not exceptionally busty. OK, I have been looking for a bathing suit after losing 100 lbs. I wanted something that was comfortable and does not cut you under the arms. I wear a size 14-16. I usually order a large or XL, but bathing suits run small. I ordered the Xxl and it is perfect. Came earlier than I expected. Great price.

Im a PinUp!!!

This is a fabulous color and statement one piece suit!
This bathing suit has wide shoulder straps which is important for those women who need the extra support.  I like the fact that there is no wire in the bra area, and that it is a huge area to keep the bosom pushed up.  The suit fits extremely well, which I was surprised.  Its made of 87% polyester and 13% spandex.  I am used to wearing pretty much all spandex, so I don't know how well the suit will hold up in chlorine for a summer season, or throughout the year as I regularly go to an aerobics aquatic class.
There are a few things that I don't like about the suit.  For one, after I put it on the first time, the elastic in the shoulder straps became twisted, and I cant seem to untwist them.  Also, there are a lot of loose threads, and the inner seam in one section came undone on the side.  This was only after trying it on one time.  I cant imagine how it will hold up with wearing it on a continual basis.  I will probably not wear it in the pool on a regular basic, but will wear it at the beach as I don't usually go in the water.  Please take a look at the closeup detail picture I took of these issues.
Pros~  great color, fits well, keeps the bosom pushed up, no wire.
Cons ~ elastic straps are twisted, loose threads, and part of the seam has separated.
Disclaimer I did receive this item at a discount for my testing and honest unbiased review.

reviewText:
Received my order quicker than anticipated, which is always a good thing. Tried on a pair with a pair of my low cut slip-on shoes to determine if I ordered the correct size. My shoe size ranges anywhere from 9 to 10 depending on shoe style and manufacturer. Comparing your sizing chart with my shoe size, I ordered the XS size. Your product is a perfect fit, and your sizing chart is as accurate as they come.
The socks themselves fit snugly, are very comfortable and the non-slip heel material makes them even more durable when worn, meaning you don't have to be concerned with the socks sliding, stretching or becoming visible when worn with low cut slip-on shoes.
In a nutshell, you have an excellent, well made, thought provocative product and I would highly recommend it to anyone/everyone. Thank you!

I bought these to wear with my L.L. Bean boat shoes. I had previously picked up a few pairs of Gold-Toe no-show socks from a local department store. Problem is, the Gold-Toes became uncomfortable after a few hours because I was unable to figure out a way to adjust my shoes so that the neither slipped off too easily nor exerted uncomfortable pressure on the top of my feet.

These no-shows solved many of the problems that I encountered with the Gold-Toes. They're thin but sturdy. I bought three to start with, and I was so happy with them that I purchased another three. They're not perfect--hence only four stars--because sometimes they too can begin to feel a bit uncomfortable. Yet I'm also able to walk for an hour or so without my feet bothering me.

This is my fourth attempt at buying no-show socks for men that fit properly, don't hurt, and don't slip off my size 11 foot. This is the product you want ... Trust me.

If it helps you, here's what I learned prior to this purchase.

1. For most brands, no matter what the packaging says: "One size fits all" is simply NOT true when it comes to no-show socks. Even if they fit when you first try them on, you can expect that some brands will shrink after washing, pretty much rendering them useless if you have a large foot. I like this product because you can buy them in different sizes, ensuring you get something that fits. I purchased the large "extra coverage" for my size 11 foot. They fit just right after washing, and are still truly no-show.

2. If you have a large foot (size 10.5 or larger) don't even bother buying socks that don't have a silicone grip inside the heel. If you buy the "one size fits all" no-show socks without silicone, you will quickly find that the socks will not stay on your heel and will get bunched up under your feet inside the toes of your shoes (forcing you to repeatedly take of your shoes to put your socks back on.) Not only does this product have silicone, but it has a noticeable, sizable amount, ensuring your socks stay on. (Other socks that have silicone just have 2-3 wavy lines of gripping material, but this has a large-sized oval on the heel, ensuring grip.) See pic.

3. Check whether the elastic in the openings are round or flat! The sock opening (where your feet go) on most no-show socks is made with some type of elastic band. If that band is round in shape, you may find that the sock will cut into your feet over time when your shoes are on, possibly even cutting off circulation if you have veins that show easily. Make sure you get socks with a flattened elastic band to minimize this feeling.

4. Not all socks are truly no-show. Regardless of what the packaging says, the best no-show socks are ones that are cut below the ankle, not on it or above it. If the socks you're considering appear to have material on an ankle, you can expect not to like how they'll look when wearing your boat shoes or driving moccasins. These socks are truly no-show ... unseen, yet still functional.

I wish I had known about this brand of socks before, but at least now I know. Learn from my trial/error ... Large-footed men: buy these if looking for no-show socks.
summary: Large-footed men: Stop searching. This is the no-show sock you want. (Learn from my sock-searching adventure!)

This bag is much larger in person and that is either good or bad, depending on your style really. This bag isn't for everyone for sure, it's more for those with some retro styles. The canvas material is very good and it does come with a shoulder strap. There is no padding on the shoulder strap in case anyone was wondering. There is the interesting front flap zippered storage. It has 2 zippers so that you can unzip in either direction and its best to unzip it when the bag is laying on its back, cause you don't' want to unzip it while holding it, items inside will fall straight down. There is also the main zippered compartment and inside has 2 additional small zippered pockets for smaller items. Finally in the back there is a small zippered pocket for like keys or a small size phone. Overall it's a bag that has it's own unique style and works best for individuals with similar style. I did however find that the main zippered compartment tends to not zip properly. Sometimes when you think you zipped it closed, you are actually unzipping it, as you can see in my video. I have attached some Image / Video, it might not show up right away. Amazon has since change the way how they process these and when it will show up on the reviews. Please be patience. Thank You. A free sample was provided for this evaluation.

This bag is absolutely huge! It's more of a weekend bag than a book or school bag. The materials are for sure inferior and cheap. Zippers wouldn't run right straight out of the package the day it arrived. The lining was not sewn down to the inside of the bag.  I can't imagine trying to stuff this bag full only to be met with lining and stitching  ripping out, zippers breaking, and crossbody strap breaking off the caribiner clips. The "leather" accents on the bag are a joke. More like brown felt made to look like leather. In fact brown felt probably would have looked better. The "red" color is a deep purple icky color. There are three slip pockets inside and two outside zip pockets. Larger is the "duck bill" pocket on the front with a smaller zip on the backside. The larger slip pocket inside could hold your cell phone, the two smaller inside only owns and pencils one each. The larger zip compartment inside could hold my kindle voyage about 6"x4" and the smaller inside zip is for change or cash.  As for the flap pocket on the front I'm mystified to what purpose it serves. It's this big long flap which opens up into a very small pocket on the out side of the bag. Looks like an ugly duck bill. Aesthetics maybe? If it were quality I would have kept it. But it's just cheap over seas crap. I'm 5'4" so this should give you some idea as to how large the bag is. Not for petite people.

I am a regular Woman Within shopper so I wanted to write a little something about this gown. Typically there clothes run large. This one ran particularly large. I would actually suggest ordering two sizes smaller. (I know, seems like a lot)

The pocket seems to be sewn on the wrong side. It's on the my left as I'm wearing it and awkward. I truly miss the gowns/loungers from Swim365 they used to sell years ago and labeled as a "swim suit coverup". It was so perfect- it was just below the knee, had two pockets which were sewn on front that I like, they wash like nobody's business, and the fabric was Top Notch!

The quality of fabrics of today's Woman Within has definitely declined dramatically, including this gown.

All in all I have to say, I would indeed buy this one again. It's closest to the Swim365 cover up I can find, but only because I don't have any other choice. I'm not crazy about it but I am home 24/7 and have to be comfortable and have at least one pocket.

I hope this helps and I hope one day Swim365 will start making their two-pocket cover ups again so we can get them from Woman Within once again. They were the perfect little things for everything; the perfect summer dress, for an actual cover up, a nightgown to sleep in, lounge wear for the house, carry my keys, wallet, phone, and whatever else my granddaughter would stuff in there!
summary: Okay, A Yes And A No

I am beyond happy with the Chicken Lady Lineart | Artsy Chickens Drawing Ladies' Triblend Racerback Tank by Ann Arbor T-shirt Co. I purchased for myself as a birthday gift this month! It's likely going to be the first of many more chicken themed shirts and products to grace my closet.

I am 5 foot 2 inches tall and weight 125lbs. The size small fits well! The line art is screen printed so there's no worry of it peeling. cracking, etc.  The quality is top-notch! It's so comfortable against the skin when worn. I wasn't sure of the color but it's certainly more peach colored than it appeared on my computer screen. I can do peach! It looks good.

My speckled Sussex "Elanor" was overly curious and even tried to hop up on my selfie stick while I got these photos taken then my husband came out and took the rest. If he hadn't come I likely would have ended up with a chicken on my shoulder or head ( it's happened multiple times before from this hen).

I highly recommend this top!
So cute! Just as expected. High quality tank.

I love the soft peach color of this tank, and the chicken print is cute and well-done with no weird errors or missing bits. The fabric is lightweight, breathable, and incredibly soft, although I do worry a bit about the seams at the shoulder straps; because the fabric is so thin and the straps narrow, I worry about the stitching coming undone. It would be easy enough to repair if it does happen, but hopefully it won't be an issue.

I always wash screen printed t-shirts inside out to extend the life of the print, and air dry them for the same reason. This tank went through the wash without issue, with no damage to the print or shrinking of the fabric.

Product sample provided at a discount for evaluation and reviewing purposes.

This comes folded up in a plastic wrapper.  It is made of a very thin cotton fabric which we solved by pairing it over a thick cotton tank top so you cannot see through it.  The edges are all serged but we haven't had an issue with irritation from rubbing.
The shirt does run large, so be aware when ordering. The design is printed well and looks great.  The shirt washed up fine with no fading or shrinking.

 I hope this was helpful to someone!

It has a 'drawing' style hen and rooster on the front of it. The graphic is a sorta rust or brown color so it contrasts nicely with the peach of the tank top. It's very soft and comfortable. It's lightweight which is perfect for summer. I would definitely recommend this shirt for my chicken loving friends.

I also do not believe the fabric to be polyester. It is very thin and see through and stitched very poorly. One of my legs was stitched with LIME GREEN thread. I also received the romper with a stain on the sleeve. Even though the low price is tempting, do not buy this. The chance of it fitting your body are very slim. The bodice of this shaper fits great but then the bust is a weird contradiction of sizes with no way to adjust. There are tiny half-cups inside, but very low in comparison to the outer open bust shape and much smaller, cup size wise. Maybe with big fake boobs this would work but as is the weird shape creates a spillover effect from the small cup and no hold by the outer split cup, which I thought would show an enticing glimpse of top of breast but forces my nipple out of it in a weird pinched triangle shape. Hard to describe. It should have an optional cover flap or a more explicit picture showing where it's supposed to sit and that the nipple and a small portion of boob will protrude. And the sizes of the half cup and outer cup should match. Also super loose from the bust to my shoulders, with long floppy straps that don't adjust at all. I'm disappointed. It looks so cool in the picture.

reviewText:
This seems like a decent sock. Unfortunately it is a sized sock, and a Very sized sock at that. The sock that arrived is an XS for US 5 - 6.5 .. I wear a US 11.

The sock itself is thin (from the perspective of someone shopping hiking socks) with a stretchy nylon feel to it. When I pulled up Thorlos' site, I found it is indeed 43% nylon, 11% polyester, 12% copper polyester, and 23% thor-wick cool copper poly, their proprietary anti-microbial metal fabric. Seems it's made to be moisture wicking and cooling.

The padding is local to the heel/achilles and toe/pad only, with arch and calf compression.

It seems this sock is designed as a sports sock- running, soccer, ... sporty things... for sporty women with tiiiiny feet. :)
Thorlos offers it in 6 other colors and all sizes of course. enjoy.
summary: fine product, not for me. only XS

It also has significant breast pads, which make you look molded and in place, which can be good or bad for you.  The pads don't provide support, just a nice appearance of support.  I don't think this one will last long, and with the looseness of the top, i am a bit concerned about getting wet.  If you are top-heavy or broad chested, this may be a great suit for you (I am a 34DD, size 10 bottom). i would guess if i were a 36 DD or a 36F, this would be stellar for the price.

I purchased this shirt for my fianc to wear during our engagement photo shoot. We wanted something dark to fit with our woodsy, vampire-esque theme. He prefers long-sleeved dress shirts, but we knew that a long-sleeved, black dress shirt and the mid-day summer heat would not mix well. I looked around on Amazon for a shirt that was thin and breathable enough to work for our needs. I was initially wary of purchasing this shirt due to the mixed reviews; it was difficult to tell which size my fianc would need because the customer reviews and size chart seemed to differ quite a bit. I took a chance and ordered the XXXL in black (which seems kind of crazy because he wears a medium in US sizes) and held my breath when he tried it on.

What do you know? It fit just the way he wanted it to and the material was perfectly lightweight and airy. He was pretty thrilled with the outcome, regardless of the fact that the tag reading "XXXL" made him "feel fat" (such a joker), and we're both very happy with how the pictures turned out. I think it's pretty safe to say that he was comfortable throughout the entire photo shoot while I was adjusting my hair, fixing my dress, wiping sweat off of my upper lip, etc. Sometimes guys have it so good.

Overall, this was a great purchase for the price and quality. Dress shirts can be crazy expensive, and considering the amount of use this one will likely get on date nights, work functions and photo shoots, it has basically already paid for itself. We've also ordered the light blue color in the same size and he wears it to work every week. Can't go wrong with this purchase!

reviewText:
I am not a nursing mother but I like these criss cross tanks to wear underneath outer garments and for sleeping. I ordered this in a size medium as I have a 36 inch bust and it fits well. I really like the adjustable straps. Worn alone it is ok for at home, but not for going out so that is when I insert the included pads to cover and prevent show. I really like the color -- I got the pink. The pads are inserted through a little slit on the sides and they are probably less than 1/4 inch thick and when you situate them, they look just fine. There is not much breast support, however, so take that into consideration.

The only thing I did not like was that the size tag was sewn into the front bottom of the tank. When I ripped it off, I loosened the threads. I noticed that the thread line was separate from the regular seams, but still -- I wish they would not sew these on as I don't like having to take a chance on ruining the seams. It's OK because it was indeed separate, but I had to painstakingly remove the thread line.

I received this for my objective evaluation and review and I really like the color and fit. I'll be wearing this for sleep and for a camisole (with the pads) as the foundation for layered look. It is well made.

I received this product with a discount in exchange of my honest review. This is a great great design. The quality is good and the sizing needs to be very careful when purchasing. It takes some time to arrive but i had a good experience overall.

reviewText: Very cheaply made

The zeger Lende Men Trench Coat Winter Long Jacket Double Breasted Overcoat, is very economically priced for a trench coat, but remember--you get what you pay for. From a distance, the coat drapes nicely, but up-close, the flaws are clear to see. The material is a cheap, micro-pore fabric that is highly flammable. The inner lining is a cheap polyester, that's not even fitted properly to the shell. And for a winter jacket, it offers very little warmth. But it looks good. I've been saving this for a Cosplay outfit for a future Comic-Con. All-in-all, I'd have to say this was my worst purchase ever on Amazon.com
summary: Very economically priced for a trench coat, but remember--you get what you pay for!

reviewText: I ordered a small, and it came short and wide

I'm a small, 95lb, 5'3 girl who purchased a size S. It fit great -- the leg and torso openings weren't too small or big for me. It also looked pretty good.

The only thing that I'd look at for is the cup size. The size Small would probably fit a B cup the best. As an A cup girl, the wiring dug into my chest which led to a little discomfort. The cups also rested a bit awkwardly on my small chest as they were a bit rigid. I would recommend buying a different swimsuit if you're small chested like me.

One other note: You will indeed get strange tan lines on your stomach if you purchase this! This is better for a backyard pool rather than laying out on the beach in the middle of the summer. So, if you tan easily or want to get normal tan lines, I'd recommend another swimsuit as well!

reviewText: I put it on the wall
Great mask for my masquerade party. Pretty feathers, good quality.

This mask looks even better in person - the laser cut design is intricate & stunning. The rhinestone accents are put in all the right places without being tacky.

Unfortunately, the mask has two major flaws:
1. Despite careful packaging by the seller, the peacock feather accent & a few rhinestones were broken off of the mask.
2. It's uncomfortable, bordering on painful. More than most masks should be. While the metal bends to fit your head, the eyes are cut a little low & make it a bit difficult to see. In addition, there's a large rhinestone that burrows into the middle of your forehead. I had the mask on for only a few minutes, but when I took it off, there was a visible red groove on my forehead.

I've gotten a mask from Coxeer before and, just like the previous mask, this one is more suitable for fashion than function. I don't recommend it for long periods of wear, but I do recommend it for decor. (Again, it is beautiful.)

Note: I received this product at a steep discount via Review Kick in exchange for my unbiased review.
summary: GORGEOUS Mask, But Uncomfortable & Broken Upon Arrival

reviewText:
These socks are affordable AND great quality, can't beat inexpensive and high quality socks like these :)

I am a women with size 6.5 feet (in women, 5 in MEN size) and they fit PERFECTLY!!! I was worried they would be too large because it is in men's size but they fit like a glove!

What I like most about these socks is that they are thin enough that they can be worn with boots and are still breathable AND they stay put throughout the day and don't slide down. I despise wearing ankle socks when I am wearing boots because they always slide down the heel of my foot and I am constantly having to readjust/ pull them up but I had no problems with these socks! They stayed put all day, even when I was walking to/ from class, did not need to readjust at all!! I can only imagine that these would hold up even BETTER with sneakers!

For the price and quality these are a 5/5!

I will continue to use this products within the next few weeks to come and I will update if my opinions change in any way.

** Although I did receive this product for free or at a discounted price, all of my reviews are 100% real, and unbiased. I rely heavily on the reviews of others in deciphering if a product will best suit my needs, and therefore I pride myself on reviewing all products fairly and impartially. If you have any questions about the product.

And if this was helpful, please click the "helpful" button :)
summary: Great socks at a great price

reviewText: I was hoping that these would come close to fitting our size 9 feet, but it didn't at all.  There is no way that it would go through the wash/dryer and still fit.  The sock fabric was nice and I could still use them but not on my feet.  In the Winter I but an ointment on my hands to help with dry skin (bag Balm), slather it on and put a clean pair of socks over you hands for over night.  I received this product at a discount for my honest review that is my own feeling on this product and may or may-not be the same as yours. I will only leave an honest review no matter if I receive a discount or not. I will update my reviews to add or subtract stars if the product changes during use.  The way that I review varies with each item.  Some have so many great things that it is easy to go on and on about all of the positive things.  Others only have enough to state that they are bad.  If a review is too long people stop reading it so what is the point.  My Stars also depend on how I I like/dislike the product on my own personal level. I may also list a product as 3 stars even though I didn't like it as it may be a good product in itself for someone else.  Just because it didn't work exactly the way I wanted it to doesn't mean that it is a bad product all around.  I hope that makes sense.  I also may list something as a 5 star only to come back after a a time to update how the product is and lower the stars.  Some products seem great at first and then the more you use it the less they work, break or just all around didn't perform to my satisfaction. If my review helped you make your decision I am glad to have helped.  You can click on the yes it was helpful button but in no way am I saying that you have to.  I don't do that often myself unless I feel they really helped. Make sure to ask questions if you have any to people who have make reviews !  If they respond and answer your questions then that is a review that is from someone that cares and I will answer any question that comes my way.
summary: Didn't fit but used for something else

reviewText: This was exactly what I needed. I needed thin socks to wear with slide on shoes, vans and dressy shoes without falling down. They are stretchy enough that I don't have problems with them fitting or slipping off. They are also super soft and comfortable. I'm able to put lotion on my feet and then these socks and it works great. I always need more black socks

Like another person that did the review, my first look at the sock and I thought they were for kids.  They look so tiny and did not think they would fit me.  Not that I am big my shoe size is six.  But once I put them on I was even more surprised they fit without feeling too tight.  They are actually very comfortable and almost feel like you have nothing on your feet.  They allow your toes to breathe and that is good especially during the summer.  There was only one thing that I did not like, the smell on the socks.  Not sure if it was from the packaging or not but I did have to wash them to get the smell out.  Otherwise they are great socks, very low profile allowing you to wear them with various different shoes.  Hope you like them as much as I do.

Stats: I ordered Large. I am 5'3", 140lbs, size 7/8 pant, 36A pear.

*Well made, stitching is nice, and colors are pretty

I am no spring chicken, 33 yo with 2 kids and I need to hide a little "baby fat" that is now "just fat", lol. I can not and will not fit into a low rise or string bikini, but I don't want an old lady bathing suit either! To all bathing suit manufacturers- the "30 something year old who have been pregnant, breast fed, and lost their 20 and below body" is a severely under-served bathing suit market and someone will make millions cashing in on that...anyhow...
Cons-
*The back is FULL COVERAGE- and I mean I feel like I'm wearing a diaper! My rear side is the only thing I have left going for me after my once fit pre-pregnancy bod. For some they prefer full, for me it's all I have left that I am comfortable with, lol.
*The top is wayyyy too big for an A cup! Listen- I once was a cute and healthy 34B, but parts have expanded and other parts have shrunk- in all the wrong ways. So yeah if you are like a 38C cup or bigger, the large will fit you.

Good news is I'm returning with no hassle for full refund.

The colors are beautiful but unfortunately the product is severely flawed!

The fit and feel of the skirt is great. The size was perfect and the elastic band is forgiving. The print however is slightly pixelated. It looks like they took a great print and tried to blow it up just a smidgen too big and appears blurry. Bummer!

I honestly do not even know how this fits.  Mine arrived with the zipper sewn shut.  The stitches go right through the plastic zipper and have bent it.  If I took out those stitches the zipper would still be too damaged to use.  The print is a ridiculous copy of a worse copy of the original print shown in the stock photo.  The pictures show how blurry the print is and exactly how far the zipper comes down.  I would love a replacement that I can ACTUALLY TRY ON.
summary: Don't waste your time or money on a blurry skirt where the zipper is sewn shut.

reviewText: So far so good. Was looking for an everyday bag and stumbled across this one. It's a good size and not overly large like some tote bags. As far as endurance I've just had a few weeks so hard to tell at this point. The interior is lined with several pockets for cell phone, keys, etc. The color is true to the photograph. I have the camel/taupe. I was a little leary because the photo of the blue in a review showed a more suttle blue and the photo on Amazon showed a bright blue which I didn't care for. Great price.

Did not like exterior or interior material. Exterior is some sort of faux leather and interior is plastic. Cheap looking for my taste. Size okay. Just couldn't even consider because of inferior material.

This leather tote bag is a good alternative to my large leather bag that I use as an airline carry on, but is sometimes just too big for practical every day use.
It is constructed well.  It claims to be and appears to be vintage waxed leather, but lacks the leather smell.  The stitching is even and tight.  There are small brass knob feet on the bottom of the bag to help it sit flat on the ground.  It is large, but still light weight.

This bag has lots of zippers.  The top closes with a zipper for extra security and there is an internal zippered pocket and an external zippered pocket.  Inside there are two slip pockets.  In addition there is a smaller zip bag that comes inside the tote and is tethered to the tote with a removable strap.  The smaller zip bag is the perfect size for makeup, glasses, cell phone, keys, or anything else that you want to keep handy.

The bag is a generous 13.5 inches by 6.5 inches and is 11 inches tall.  My laptop does not fit in the bag, but I can fit my tablet, my kindle, a book, snacks, sunglasses, and a hairbrush with room to spare.  Its a lovely bag and is a good mid-size in between a purse and tote bag.  Im very happy with this bag.
summary: Roomy Bag, Mid-Sized between a Purse and a Tote

reviewText: These bralettes are perfect for lounging around the house in. Some days I don't want to wear a push up bra with an underwire when I'm just sitting at home relaxing and these are great for keeping me comfortable and giving me a bit of support. I'm a 36C and ordered the large and they fit perfectly. I love the colors they came in and the lace is gorgeous. I can wear these with tank tops and they look super cute. I wouldn't wear these in public just because they don't give enough support and don't have much lining but for around the house they are perfect. You could definitely see nipples if you get cold in these! These have definitely become one of my favorite bras to wear on my days off. They are just so comfortable, lightweight, and cute. Perfect for summer. *discount received for testing and review*

I am actually really loving these lace bras. The cup for as expected and like my usual bras. The straps are lacey, as pictured, so they don't hold up with the same support as a normal bra. The back and sides are all lace which is really comfortable. I like how they are delicate and breathable. I would use these as sleep bras or last day bras. I wouldn't wear them as a night on the town sort of thing. I think had I ordered a size smaller than what indicates on the size chart that it would fit tighter and be more supportive. Then I would use them as an out and about bra. But I think the cups would be a lot smaller and probably not as comfy and the indicates size. Its the purchasers choice as to which you order and for which purpose you want them for. I love the unrestrained comfort especially for sleep. (:
*I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review. All opinions are my own.*

reviewText:
I never order bras online for the simple reason that they never end up fitting properly. These bras are gorgeous. The lace all over adds an extra delicate and feminine touch. Despite the underwire they are extremely comfortable. These do not contain a clasp in back nor do they have adjustable straps. Instead they slide on like a sport bra over your head. I will definitely say that these bras gorgeous as they are will never be worn outside my house. They are perfect for sleeping though! I don't feel that they have adequate support (I am a 38C) for public use and  the lining is so sheer that I would feel quite exposed. Overall I loved the lace bras. I'm not 100% oh their durability, but that I can always update at a later date when I start to see how they hold up over time.

*I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for my honest, unbiased opinion.

This 3 pack of Lace Bralettes is kind of combination between a bra and sports bra in my opinion. They are all lace including the back. The back is a sports bra style and there are no hooks. The shoulder straps are lace as well and have some elasticity to them. The straps are not adjustable. The cup area is lined on the underside with a cotton material. That is the only "padding" if you even want to call it that. It's not thicker like padding so I would say it a lining. These do have underwire in them. These are a very pretty style and have a nice look when on. My daughter wears a 38C bra and I ordered the XL for her and they fit her around the back and in the cup area. The shoulder straps worked good for her too and do not slide down on her. Over many times of wearing, I could see that the straps may possible stretch out but if that happens I will be sure to update this for you to let you know. Seeing how these looked on her and being a C cup, I don't think these would fit a larger size breast. These don't have much support even though they are underwire. I think it's due to them being all lace. My daughter said they are comfortable but she almost feels like when she bends over she's gonna slip out of the cup area. The only issue I noticed with these as far as quality goes is the straps. There are some threads/fuzz on the side of all the straps (I show this in my video). I think it's just because of them being lace because it's not like they are falling apart or unraveling or anything. Overall, they are a pretty style and a decent quality. Definitely not a VS quality but I wasn't expecting that when I ordered them. I received this product with a promotional discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review. No compensation for a positive review was provided. All of my reviews are based 100% off of my experience with the product and I never guarantee a positive review.
summary: Cute Bras! Combination Between a Bra & Sports Bra Style!

Also, I received this shirt at a discounted price in exchange for my completely honest review

I am 5'-4" tall and weigh ~120 lbs. I wear a US size 2 and typically a juniors small/medium at retailers like Forever21. I ordered this top in a large based off the size chart, allowing enough room in the chest. The large fits well, it covers my entire top half and hangs comfortably over the top of my pants (no accidental crop top). The back has the same dramatic low cut as shown. The armpits are cut a little awkward, there is some gapping, but nothing terrible. I would definitely want to wear a bra with this top and would probably opt to wear a bandeau over it to hide the straps. It is made of a cotton material, similar to a regular t-shirt blend. The material is a little stiff, like a new shirt, which doesn't help the gapping up top. Hopefully it softens up after a few times through the wash. Definitely a cute top for summer.

I'm not sure if it is an allergic reaction but I've stopped wearing these. They also smell slightly like motor oil or something chemical, so I don't believe these are safe, at least not for me. I'm still giving 2 stars because they really do create a nice lift, but I really don't want to use something that leeches chemicals into my body and could potentially cause breast cancer, etc. I can't recommend these for that reason alone. Not worth it.

I have a beach trip coming up in the next week and due to some unexpected life events, I hadn't had a chance to go shopping for a swimsuit. I wanted to go alone, without my 3 kids, but with how busy I know I'll be over the next week I knew I wasn't going to have the time. Like many women, I dread swimsuit shopping. Things just never seem to fit well or look as flattering as you want them to be. I was nervous shopping for a swimsuit on Amazon, but I decided to try it. To be safe, I perused the swimsuits, saved my favorites and narrowed it down to 5 suits that had a return policy and ordered those, hoping to find at least 1, maybe 2 keepers.

A little about me: I'm 5'8.5", weigh 155 pounds and wearing 36C bra. I have a straight figure, not much in curves. I don't have my waist and hip measurements, but I do know my waist is only about 3-4" smaller than my hips, definitely not curvy. I typically wear either an 8 or 10 in pants and a XS or S in tops and I have an average length torso. As I mentioned above, I have 3 children, all birthed by me, so I have earned my stripes on my stomach and that excess pooch from pregnancy, something I prefer covering up. When swimsuit shopping, I look for a 1-piece that covers up my belly region and that has some support and padding in the chest area as it doesn't take much to flatten me out.

The suit (I ordered one in red and one in light blue to try on)
Pros: Both colors of this suit that I purchased are very pretty. As stated above I look for a suit that helps cover up my stomach area and masks my pooch as well as enhance my chest and not flatten me out. The picture of this suit looked like it would do both. The chest area of this suit is great. With the crisscross of the material and the molded cups inside it did fit well in the chest area. I did like how it looked on the upper part of my body.

Cons: Normally the ruching, like what is shown on this suit, helps with covering up the pooch in my stomach area. However the material of this swimsuit seems thinner than other suits I tried on. Also, which I ordered the size recommended for my normal clothing size, this suit felt a little loose on me. Because of those 2 reasons, this suit did not smooth out my stomach region. Actually, as shown in my side view, I can even see some "excess" on my back that just isn't as flattering. The other suits I tried on kept my back looking smooth....at least when posing for my pictures. Despite the suit being a little big, I felt like going down a size wouldn't have helped much because of how thin the material was and because the material didn't seem as stretchy as other suit material that typically helps smooth out the figure. Another downside with the suit was the suits seemed designed for a long torso. I had bagginess in the crotch area, not attractive at all. Again, I don't think going down a size would have helped as it was really loose compared to the rest of the fit. And pulling it up on top and tying the straps tighter didn't help because then it pulled the chest up too high and I was hanging out below the cups. I knew once you got the suit wet, the bagginess in the crotch area would be worse as wet material hangs lower than dry! Not something I want to deal with on a public beach.

There were just too many cons for me to consider keeping either of these suits. The price, the colors and the fit in the chest area were great, but the thinness and lack of stretchiness in the material and the loose fit overall just made this a no for me. The only person I would recommend this for is people that have a long torso and have a hard time finding a 1-piece suit that actually fits in length.

If you would like to read my other swimsuit reviews, I believe if you click on my name you can view other reviews.

This is such a cute top! I'm 5'10 and roughly 140 lbs, and usually purchase a US medium. I typically wear a larger small to a medium. Based on the size chart, I purchased this in a US M (Asian 2XL) and think the fit is perfect. It's a bit of a looser top, but still flattering. The looseness was primarily a the top, with a bit more form fitting in the waist.  I would suggest if you are between sizes, or on the verge of the next size up, to opt for the larger size.

The sleeve detail was nice, with the open cut and ties, but it was closed enough at the top to make this okay for work (hiding bra straps, mainly). The top is a relatively thick mostly polyester material, with a bit of stretch to it. For a polyester, it had some weight to it and was a bit heavy--I could see this being not so breathable feeling on a hot day, but the loose fit should make it so that it would still feel comfortable. It wasn't stiff, though, and had nice movement.

I washed this on delicate and hung to dry with no issues--no shrinking, bleeding of color, or fading. The colors are bright and vibrant, and very solid. Very true colors with no faded look--the color is as solid in one spot as it is in the other. It also dried very nicely, with zero need to iron (no wrinkles or creases)

Overall, very solid and very cute top. The detail is fun and it's a unique top. Easy wash and wear. I wore it for work (office casual setting) and think it's a great addition to my wardrobe. I did receive this top at a slight discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. All opinions are 100% my own.

reviewText:
The design on these is cute and I honestly ordered them for my daughter as I feel they can be more gender neutral than some items.  When I received the outfit, it wasn't what I expected.  It was brand new so that wasn't the issue.  What confuses me about this outfit is it seems stuck between spring and summer.  The arms are super short but the leg area is more like long shorts.  We live in the desert so that isn't a big deal to us but anywhere else and I can see it being an issue.  The fabric, even after washing, isn't super soft but did soften a little bit.  The snap closure is nice because it provides easy access for diaper changes and the like.  It did have a smell to it when it first arrived but I just left it sitting in the empty laundry basket for a few extra days and the smell disappeared after the first wash. It seemed to shrink a little after washing the first time as well.  I am only giving this three stars because I feel that the cut is a bit odd and the smell should never have been there.  I also don't like clothes that shrink (typical of baby clothes but it drives me nuts!).  I also believe the pattern is more gender neutral and the company shouldn't list it as boys clothing since its an animal print.

The pictures are not of the product that you receive.  The pics are of the original item made by Seven Til Midnight here: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00BJORMES  an item which I've purchased and really liked.  So I thought this would be the same or very similar, but it's a cheap knockoff.  For example, the Seven til Midnight version has a slit in both sides of the bottoms, and Etaoline's pics show these same slits. But the product itself has no slits, just a triangular patch of lace sewed on over the shorts (see my attached pics).  They aren't cut as flirty or sexy either.

Additionally, they aren't nearly as soft or silky.  I ordered these in white and my bottoms arrived with a green stain clearly visible through the plastic, and the tops had a pull in them.  So the quality control is absent as well.  At least the customer service was decent as they offered me a refund.
summary: Not as Pictured, Low Quality.  See my pics

reviewText:
I wanted some nice silky feeling pajamas to wear. Something that would be soft and cool on my skin to sleep in this coming Summer. The ETAOLINE Womens 2 Piece Short Lace Satin Cami Pajamas Sets, Sleepwear, arrived on time, in a package for protection.
There are two pieces for this set, the Cami Top, and the Shorts. Ill start with the short, they are very nice with a stretchy waist band. They have a very nice lace pattern on the front, with the design of Flowers and lines. There is also lace on the sides of these sleep shorts. The feel of them on me is nice, it doesnt stick to my skin, or get to hot that I cant sleep.
The Cami Top is really pretty, and has the same lace design as the shorts. The lace is underneath the breast area, and there is not backing to it. Just the lace which is see through. This top also has adjustable shoulder straps to make sure you get the fit you want, for sleeping. The top has elastic around the back of it, however, it does not stretch near as much as the shorts do. This top falls right about the waist area in length, and isn't tight as all. Its more of a floating, flowing top, that allows you to move freely and breath. Im a big girl, and I say that because I cant stand to have clothes tight on me. I like to have clothes that fit loose, and allow some room to be comfortable. This set is perfect for that.
I think this would make a great Birthday Gift, or Holiday Gift for any female. Its beautiful and would be excellent on ones wedding night as well. Its great for sleeping in.
Disclaimer - I received this product free for a fair, honest and unbiased review.
summary: Soft and Sexy to sleep in..

reviewText:
I ordered this for me.  I love the feeling of something special when I go to bed and just feel nice.  This is an outfit you an wear when alone or with your special someone.

With that said, because I have a large chest, I ordered this 2 sizes bigger than I would normally need based on the measurements given and it fit nicely. (This is my only reason for 4 stars instead of 5).  This is normal practice for me and the gamble paid off.  I do not like things tight.  I would suggest keeping this in mind when ordering.  There are adjustable straps on the shoulders that allow for a nice fit.  I would describe this camisole pajama set as comfortably sexy.

 I loved the feel of the material, it is nice and the lace detail is well made.  The lace adds to the look of the outfit.  There is a lace trim on the camisole and also on the shorts. There are fine details all around.  The ends are nicely finished.

This is an outfit that would make a nice gift for someone.  It would be a great set for a bridal lingerie shower, a special night with your special friend or even if you just want a nice outfit for hot summer nights alone.  I do feel this is priced right.  I would purchase this again in other colors.

Disclosure:  I was sent this item free in exchange for my honest and unbiased feedback.  I was not paid for my review.

reviewText:
THis looks nothing like the picture, other than it's red and long. It's always a hit or miss with things from China but this is definitely a huge miss. Like every single reviewer has stated, it is completely sheer and thin. The quality is bad; there are loose threads all over and the hem is the most f***ed up hem I ever saw someone try to sell. I barely know how to sew and I'm pretty sure I can do a better job than that. There's a gap around the smocked waist section that I think they tried to salvage by adding the tassels? Even if you tie it there's still awkward gaps showing skin. Ugh I wanted to like this so badly that I gave it 2 stars when I started writing, but as I continue to write this I have to be honest and say I hate it. The only redeeming quality is that it is chiffon (super thin chiffon) and the little buttons down the front are cute. Honestly, don't buy this and if anyone finds the real dress in the picture please let me know. I want that one.

If you do plan on buying this and need a size reference, I'm usually a size 0 or 2 in dresses and the small fit me perfectly.

*I did receive this product at a discounted price or for free. However, I try to base my review off of the listed Amazon price. Having said that, I absolutely do not think this dress is worth $25. It's not even worth how much I paid for it with a discount. Total ripoff. The company neither paid me, nor did they encourage me to give them a high review. My words are my own and I try to be as honest and unbiased as I can be.
summary: Don't buy this! Looks nothing like the picture

reviewText: This dress was of good quality material, sheer and great for the summer.  I gave it to my daughter because it was somewhat long and small around the waist.  It fit her great as she is 5'7.  Whoever wears this needs to wear shorts, a cami or other garments underneath since it is see through but can be dressed up and down for any occasion.  Very stylish for the youngsters.  I received this product at a discount price for an honest and unbiased review.

reviewText:
Im really torn on this Open Leg Long Maxi Print Dress from Blink.  The pattern is really pretty, but on me it just looks sort of frumpy unless Im moving.  The dress does flow nicely outside when a breeze hits it.  But otherwise, just hangs there.  This is definitely a dress that looks better in motion.

Cons - The dress is super see through.  I will have to buy something to wear underneath it.  And the closures for the buttons gap open pretty bad, especially in the chest area, so Ill need a lacy cami perhaps so I can leave the top unbuttoned.  A belt is needed with this dress as well because there is no button on the elastic waist part where it ties and it gaps open.  Also, there were a  few loose strings I had to cut off from the seams.

Sizing  - I am 5 5 and weigh around 140lbs.  I ordered this in a medium and it fits, but is a bit snug in the upper arms and chest area.

Thanks to the seller for selecting me to review this product at a discounted rate for my honest and unbiased review.

reviewText: such a great mask for mardi gras

LOVING this mask so far. I got it as a spare for a Carnaval ball I am attending, and so very glad I did! The tallness of these feathers is NOT an exaggeration! They stand almost a full 12 inches from the top of the mask. The black and white smaller feathers between the eyes are anchored by a pearl or opal pendant surrounded by a gold border to add sparkle. The mask itself is molded plastic that happens to fit my face perfectly; and has ribbons attached to each side to secure it to one's head. VERY good quality mask for the price. No tags attached, so not sure where it is made. Because the mask is molded plastic, I also would discourage trying to wear this over glasses.

The feathers were smashed down so that took away half of the Pizzazz of the mask. If the feathers stood up, exactly like the picture it would've been Spectacular! Because they weren't, it was only cute.
It was exactly what it looks like for the price. I was happy.
Very nice mask and very reasonably priced. Was different from everyone else.  Mission accomplished!

This shipping notification led me to buy a mask from a local Halloween store and while a few dollars cheaper it was not in the same league in terms of beauty or quality. Other reviews do a solid explanation of the ample and lustrious feathers and well placed nose bridge but having been pushed into buying a replacment I can say with certainty that THIS mask is a cut above. Well done.
