reviewText:
This Fate Love Jewelry Stainless Steel Ring is absolutely beautiful and fits perfectly! I got this ring in a size 9 which is what I normally wear on my ring finger so I was very happy that it fit. This ring has a great amount of sparkle to it; I'm a girly girl when it comes to sparkle so I adore all things that sparkle. I love that this ring is stainless steel as I have pretty sensitive skin; I haven't taken this ring off since I received it besides to take a shower and I haven't had any problems with it turning my finger or the ring colors. This ring has 1 big stone with 3 small stones on both sides of it and all stones are placed securely in their spots. This ring does come with a cute gift box so not only would it be a great gift idea but it's also gift ready! I would definitely recommend this Fate Love Jewelry Stainless Steel Ring!

**I received this product for free for testing and reviewing purposes and this is my honest and unbiased opinion**
summary: Fate Love Jewelry Stainless Steel Ring Fits Perfectly, Is Safe On Sensitive Skin, And Is Gift Ready!

reviewText:
The Anpress lamp reminds me very much of the old days in England when they used these kind of kerosene lamps in the evenings.  Being English we like these lamps even today as they are just so romantic and give you that old time feeling.  It is so simple to use.  You have to plug it into your computer to charge for a few hours as the battery needs to be fully loaded.  There is an indicator light on the base that shows its working while you wait for it to charge.  There is a wheel at the front that you can use to adjust the  brightness to suit your surroundings.  I had never seen or heard of a lamp that you can simply blow out and it certainly works.  My kids love it almost as much as I do.  Very functional for camping or in an RV which is what I'm using it for.  Great look and a great gift for that person who seems to have everything.
Love the concept and the design.  Anpress did an awesome job with this Romantic Retro LED lamp.

I received this item for a discounted price in return for my fair and honest review.  This statement is my own and the words are my own also.
summary: Being English we like these lamps even today as they are just so ...

reviewText:
I ordered this during Amazon Prime Day to use for an upcoming summer hiking trip in Alaska. The jacket is cute and made of a light weight durable material. It fits roomy and well in my chest which was a pleasant surprise because I have a larger bust and usually have to worry about items zipping up properly.
Unfortunately, this jacket it a "ladies cut" and it narrows in the hips to make an uncomfortably tight in the hips. So much so that I'm worried it might rip the material if I wear it on my trip and twist or turn the wrong way. I haven't decided if I'm going to return it yet.
I would recommend this product to most people, but for hourglass or pear-shaped figures I would suggest sizing up.

I ordered this last minute before a boat trip and rugged hike -- so glad I did! After reading reviews I ordered a size up. It was a bit long, roomy in the torso, but tight around hips. But it really protected me in extreme wind and some saltwater splashes. I wore short sleeves underneath as the sun warm and this kept me cool in the sun but warm on the boat. A real bargain compared to going to REI or other sports outfitter!

summary: Avoid Hassle of Returning, Don't Buy

The hat took longer to receive than the normal prime items i buy, but was received before the estimated, minimum shipping date.  It did come in a thick plastic bag, all folded up.  I read the other reviews stating how the hat came all bent up, and how they had issues trying to shape the hat.  I was a little leary of purchasing, as i didn't want to be the one, who couldn't get it to shape correctly.  Especailly, when i want to take it with me, on an up-coming vacation.  I opened the package, and started pressing, pulling and bending the material, to shape it.  All of the bends didn't come out right away.  I placed a t-shirt in the head part of the hat, and laid the hat on a flat surface, for a few days.  Most of the fold marks have gone away on the brim part, and the fold marks in the head part are gone too.  Any other shaping, will be done automatically, once you wear the hat a time or two.  The thickness of the hat, is of quality, and not a flimsy type.  It offers a string inside, to keep the hat from blowing off your head, when windy.  I can't wait to wear this on vacation.  I put the hat on, with my oversized sunglasses.  I looked like a "Super Star!" Yes, i just had a vein moment.  Overall, i really like the hat. I would have given the hat 5 stars, if it weren't for the reshaping.
summary: After A Little Reshaping, You'll Have A Great Hat

reviewText:
Overall I'm very pleased with this necklace. The colors are beautiful and rich and sparkly--perfect for a fun evening out. It's a fun little sparkly item that pairs well with much of my wardrobe. Versatile enough to go with much of what I wear, but sparkly enough to dress up an simple outfit for a fun night out. I've worn this a few times and it appears to be wearing well and plenty strong for casual use.

The product image made this look like a much longer necklace than it actually is--it fits me more like a collar necklace than the matinee to opera length I was anticipating.

Disclosure: I received a discount for this product in exchange for my personal, honest, review. Regardless of discount, my review is based on my personal experience with the product.

reviewText:
I've been wearing Magistas for a few years now.  Nike ended the Total 90 line which was my go to, so I had to bounce around for a while trying to find a style that felt good to me again.  I marked that these fit as expected.  I normally wear a size 10 shoe, but always need a 10.5 in Nike Magista.

This was my first pair with the ankle sleeve.  I was a little unsure about whether or not I'd like it.  The first night I wore them, I was frustrated that it was a little difficult to put them on with the sleeve.  The second game I basically pulled them on like socks - great!  It seems like they would slip or something but they don't.  They wear like normal flats, no issue at all.  I also found that I really like the ankle support especially playing indoor.

These wear as well as previous Magista indoors I've had.  Very light, allows for a nice first touch and doesn't slow you down.  I play on the rubber pellet turf indoor, no issues with slipping at all.  Very happy with this purchase.

I am torn between giving this item either a 3 star, "It's okay" to a 4 star, " "I like it."  It has both it's pros and cons. The pros are that it does look unique looking in the photograph, the straps/bands that bind the wrist don't feel as if they will fall off at the first wear.  In fact, the band does have a secure magnetic broad clasp that should hold.  In fact, the magnet is tad too strong to try and remove one handed, but doable.

The problem I have with the item is two fold.  1) the feathers on my bracelet don't look as lush as those posted in the photograph.  I purchased the black feather bracelet.  What I mean is because the feathers were so thin, they should have been twice as many feathers used then what I received.  Or perhaps a different type of feather around the band should have been used to make the feather "band" look more full and lush.  2) the second issue I had is the band is extremely tiny.  I've never thought of myself as having large wrists but I was afraid that at first that I wasn't going to be able to fit the bracelet on wrist.  The bracelet needs to be clasped just above your hand, as shown in the photo for it to close.

Which brings me to my final point.  I although I don't feel that the feathers are plentiful enough, the feathers that are used do provide some give.  Since the feathers will be brushing the top of your hand and is on your wrist they shouldn't tear as easily because your forcing them to bend every time you bend your wrist or rotate your hand.  The magnet should certainly stand up to such movement also.

So to summarize all my thoughts on this bracelet.  The three bands are actually attractive and well secured with a magnet (I have yet to try it on for more than a couple of minutes).  I don't love the feathers that are used or think them plentiful enough; but they work well enough for where you are forced to wear the bracelet.  All in all, if you don't mind these minor issues, as long as the feathers don't fall out the bracelet should be well worth the money.
summary: It's a pretty decent bracelt; however I do have some issues with the feathers

I bought this outfit for my 3 year old foster son, and I love it! I wasn't sure I would be thrilled with the shirt, and it does have some strings that you have to end up cutting off from inside the sleeves, but it's not really a big deal and the shorts and shirt together are extremely adorable. Please enjoy my pictures. The shirt material is thing enough that it is comfortable for a child in extremely hot weather. We are in Colorado where it is dry heat, and so far it has been up to almost 90 degrees and my child was comfortable in this outfit. He was also excited to be able to button it himself as the buttons and holes are accurate and easy to use. The jeans material of the shorts is nice thick material, not cheap at all. This outfit may turn out to be our Fourth of July outfit this year.

I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review, but that doesn't meant that everything I review gets 5 stars. If I don't like something, I say so.

The shirt is made of cotton so its best to hang dry it instead of taking the chance of it shrinking in the dryer. The shorts were a little short on him so definitely order a size or 2 up. Overall I'm happy with the product and plan to order one for my son to wear next year.

This is a seriously adorable outfit. It is two pieces, a white button down shirt with collar, and shorts with suspenders. There are cute little boats all over the shirt. The suspenders are a bit long for my little guy, but we twisted them up in the back to try and make it work better. It still looked so cute!!! This is well made, I saw no flaws in the workmanship, it has snaps across the bottom to allow for diaper changes which is awesome! I absolutely love this little outfit!
I received this item for free in exchange for my honest review.

This outfit is super cute for a birthday party or for pictures. The white shirt underneath is not attached to the shorts so it can be worn separate if wanted, which I appreciated. The shorts have elastic in the leg openings, but it was not tight at all on my sons legs. I also appreciate the snaps underneath in order to quickly change a diaper without having to remove shoes and then pants completely. The suspenders were extra long on my son, but since there were two buttons I can simply move a button up and adjust that. Also you can take the suspenders off completely if you wanted. Overall, I am very pleased with this outfit and the many different ways you can use the pieces and make it work for your child.

I ordered the largest size (19-24 months) for my 15 month old who wears 18-24 months. Besides the suspenders I found it fit great with a lot of room to grow. I can see us using this outfit multiple times for a while to come.

reviewText:
Really cool little purse! Nicely sized if you don't carry too much junk in there OR for a night out. It will definitely hold a small credit card holder, cell phone and all the girly necessities needed. The only thing I don't like about it is that the width of the opening of the bag is somewhat narrow, so it's hard to rummage around in the bag for stuff. That being said, the outter pocket makes up for it. The adjustable strap makes for easy cross-body wear when you wanna go hands-free. Nicely constructed and the hardware is sturdy. Cute little tassel adds some style, too. It's somewhat "western' style to me - cute with boots!

And now this!  Disclaimer: I received this item at a discount in exchange for leaving an honest, unbiased review ... but I'd buy another one at full price if I needed it. I hate having to wonder whether a review is legit or not as I, too, do a LOT of Amazon shopping and use reviews to make purchase decisions. So I'll ALWAYS tell the truth, even if it isn't pretty.

reviewText:
Super cute and flattering romper! It is 100% polyester so it can be hot to wear in deep summer months. Love the wide elastic waistband, that it is button-up and has pockets! The material has started to pill since purchased last year but that did not keep me from buying another one in a different color. Definitely a bathing suit cover-up but I have worn it out at night. Always get compliments.
As for the size-wise, always go by the measurements not the given sizing. It is easy to measure your bust, waist and  hip to figure out which size will actually fit (not what you have always bought). As a rule of thumb, go by your largest measurement. For most women, it will be the hip size. European, Asian and American sizes are not the same nor standardized. That goes for the Amazon size chart as well, always go by the vendor's size chart. Enjoy!
summary: Buy mulitples when you know your size!

This is a nice swimsuit. Well constructed and looks of a good quality. It's simple and cute and great for a day on the beach. The top is a halter and has a clasp on the back as well. The bottoms are high waist and has some ruffles in it. I'm a bit top heavy and the bust area was a bit small to me, but that's just my issue. It may fit just fine for someone else. I received this item at a discount rate in exchange for my honest review.

I ordered a size L since I am usually a S/M in US sizing and the product description recommended ordering 2 sizes up. Ordering online always has its risks since body types differ so much, but I went with their recommendation and ordered the L. The suit arrived and fit great. The bottoms are high waist style which is nice for those of us who want more coverage than a tiny bikini bottom provides and they are very flattering. The top fit well, and you can remove the around the neck strap to wear it strapless if wanted too. The top isn't adjustable aside from the tie around the neck, so I was glad it fit so well around my chest. There is some padding in the top but I feel like it doesn't provide much lift or support even with the neck straps. It is just like pictured, simple black and white. Nice design with the little twist on the top.

When I first opened up the bathing suit I immediately knew the top wasn't going to fit.  I received an XL, and I don't think the cup size would accommodate anything larger than a C cup.  I tried it on anyway, and my assumptions were correct! The top is absolutely adorable though.  I wish it fit; I love how it extends down the rib cage (perfect to provide just that little bit of extra tummy coverage. The bottoms fit though, which I was happy about.  I love the "criss-cross" design in the front, it gives it a little extra in an area I want hidden.  The strings/strands stayed in place the entire time I wore them without hanging down.  I think the whole bathing suit is made fairly well.  All stitching was even and hasn't come undone yet or broken anywhere. Although I'm sad the top cup size was too small, I am glad the bottoms still fit me!

Disclaimer: I received this product at a free or discounted rate in return for my honest and unbiased review. The words written are my own and not influenced in any way by how much I paid. If my experience with the item changes during the course of use, I will make sure to update my review.

This bathing suit is quite cute! I ordered the small, and it fit well. It was comfortable, and I didn't feel like it would fall off, but I don't think a bandeau is the best style for my body type. You can tie the top however tight you want around the neck, and the strap around your chest fit well too. I really appreciated that the little hook they used to keep the straps for the top on, was metal! SO many bathing suits use little cheap plastic hooks...and I've had one break on me before! Metal makes me feel much more secure. =) The material isn't super thick, but it's not see-through for me. The bottoms fit well and it's a cute retro-looking suit!

If you found this review or any of my other reviews interesting or helpful, please rate is as "helpful" or leave a comment. I enjoy writing reviews on products that I love and hearing feedback, since I base many of my personal purchases off of the reviews of others as well. I also feel that honest and helpful reviews provide insight to the company. I received this product at a discount in a promotion, and this is my honest and unbiased review. I am not connected to this company or any of the companies of products that I review.

I love this bathing suit! I originally got it for Halloween party I spent in the Caribbean but it was such a hit that I'm going to wear it to the beach this summer.
The style is truly retro. The bottom has a really high waist that goes above my belly button. The top has the huge polka dot pattern.

What's more, the bathing suit is very well made and from high quality materials. You don't see any odd strings sticking out as you normally do on the cheap Chinese clothes that you get online. Every stitch is perfectly sewn.

The only downside is that unlike most swim suits, you cannot remove the padding from the bra. I personally hate these things especially on a swim suit. They just take so long to dry when you get them wet.

Finally, I was lucky enough to receive this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. I have to mention this disclaimer however, I am not affiliated with the company and I am in no way obliged to provide a positive review. The opinions expressed here are entirely my own.

I really liked this swimsuit but the top is too small for me. I thought that may be the case (which is why I chose "fit as expected") when I ordered it because normally I buy my bottoms and tops separately in different sizes. For this suit I really wanted the bottoms so I chose the size I would normally be in those. The bottoms fit great, no problems or issues but the top is too small for me.

I am 5'4" and weigh about 110 pounds. I have a 34C bust and the top fit around my rib cage just fine and clasped comfortably in the back but the cups were too small for my breast so I was spilling out on the top. I am happy to still be able to wear the bottoms because I can match them with other tops I already have and they will go well together  (that's why I chose the black ones).

The only thing I noticed is when I had the top on the front was nice and black but because the sides stretched to clasp in the back the material looked lighter. I thought it was a different color altogether (grayish) but my husband pointed out that it was just because it was stretched so the color was thinner. Not a problem in the material or the quality it's just one of those things that would bother me. I tried to get a picture of the difference, not sure how great of a job I did with that though.

I will keep the bottoms but give the top away to a friend. I was able to get this suit for free or at a discount in return for my review.
summary: Super cute but top too small for me

I own four of these J. Tomson elastic pencil midi skirts. They are awesome!

The fabric is thick, so I don't need to wear a half-slip. (Light does not shine through.)

The fabric is durable. Even though the care label says to hand wash on cold, I have washed my skirts in the washer on the regular cycle in warm water (and dried them in the dryer on medium) with other clothing and there seems to have been no shrinking, stretching or fading.

I love the comfort, the way these skirts fit. If you know what size to order for yourself, they are comfortable. I am roughly 5'3" and about 125 pounds with a fat posterior. In this particular line of skirts, I have learned that I wear a size XL. (In Target's Merona brand, I wear usually somewhere between a 4 and an 8 in pants or skirts, just for reference.)

Because the fabric is thick, these skirts are very flattering on me, with great drape.

Oh, and the patterns are cute. I've gotten plenty of compliments.
summary: Reasons I Own Four, Soon to Be Five, of These Swell Skirts

reviewText:
My wife wanted a modest swimsuit for spending time at the pool with our 1 year old. After looking at a lot (i mean a lot) of different style swimsuits she wanted to give this style a shot. It arrived very quickly from Amazon (as normal). The swimsuit material itself exceeded her expectations and it looks very well sewn. I guess the last thing you want is for it to fall apart on you. The material feels durable and soft. It does not feel like cheap material like other swimsuits she liked. The material is thicker than she expected but in a good way. She said the top bra is very supportive and the swimsuit is overall very comfortable.

The sizing chart seemed to be Asian sizing so go up 1 for American sizes. The US sizing on the drop down is correct. My wife is petite and wears a size 4. The medium was a perfect fit for her. This is a nice high quality swim suit and my wife said if you like the style you will love it. We did receive this item at a discount in exchange for an honest review.
summary: Great quality and comfortable swim suit.

reviewText:
Oh. My. Goodness. I wasn't sure what to expect when ordering this dress and was pleasantly surprised. The dress arrived in plastic bag inside a padded envelope. There was no smell like you get with some clothing. Pressed tight, it was a little wrinkly with some big creases so I tossed it in the dryer for a short cycle. Voila! Problem solved.

The colors, pattern and size are spot-on. I am 57 and 130 lbs and ordered a medium that it fits just right, not too loose, and not skin-tight. I have long legs so dresses are usually high above my knee but this dress is just below my knees. The material is thick enough I had on a bra & shorts and you cant tell or see that from any angle. For added volume you could wear a petticoat underneath but it looks just fine without it as well.

I wasn't sure about the band across the bust/chest (cutout) at first but it really adds to the look. The zipper on the back is barely visible and the cap sleeves don't constrict my arms. Perfect for any semi-formal event, you can easily dress it up or down. I wore this dress to Sunday brunch and it was a hit.

I value honest & informative reviews by other Amazon buyers to help me make informed buying decisions and hope this review helps you. I only review products that I test & use personally & I don't waste my time to post untruthful reviews. That being said, I received this product in exchange for an honest, unbiased review.

reviewText:
My daughter wore this dress to work today, and let me tell you - it is fabulous!  She says that she feels absolutely gorgeous in this dress, and I received so many compliments!

The dress itself has a nice stretchy fabric, which holds its shape, and doesn't wrinkle easily. The top part is a little bit form fitted, and the bottom has that wonderful 1950's pouf to it. I have a crinoline that I have to my daughter to wear under it, for the full 1950's look, but that is a bit much for work!

reviewText:
This is a nice swimming suit. The cup size of the top is nice, as it keeps a majority of your chest covered and just leaves the top part uncovered. The top part is a halter tie-top, so you can tighten how you would like. The strap at the bottom of your chest has only one size (you fit the hook into the hole of the other, there are not multiple hole slots to adjust). I found this tightness to be adequate for my needs. However, I did experience some boob spillage from the bottom of the swim top, as the bottom of the cup was not secure against my body. I think if I could adjust the bottom strap, the cup would be tighter and would have helped the cup be more secure against my chest to prevent lower boob spillage.

The bottoms are nice too. I like that they are more conservative than other bottoms, while still being fun and flirty. You can tighten the bottoms using the strings on the side. The bottoms fit me perfectly.

Overall, I like this swimsuit! I like that the white is thick enough that you can't see through. Both pieces are also very comfortable and fit well, for the most part. I absolutely love the look of this swim suit! I just wish you could adjust the lower part of the swim top so that those of us who are busty don't have some lower side boob peaking out. Some people may like this, but I try to be more conservative :P! I am happy overall with this product though!

*I received this product at a reduced price in exchange for my honest and unbiased review*

summary: Flashy. Exactly what I wanted from a tie with a giant rhinestone on the middle.

reviewText: Great product. Expeditious shipping.

This bowtie is so fancy! Its quite obvious that this isn't your typical bowtie. I think that it comes off a little feminine with all the embellishments but it could also be unisex if you're going for that more unique and embellished look. I personally love it since its so decorated and unique. I got the black one with the diamond in the middle. The bow is relatively big and the material seems nice and thick. Its a preset tied bow so you don't need to tie it yourself. So to wear the bowtie you hook one end of the attached strap part to the other when you wear it around your neck.  Its pretty easy to put on and you can also adjust the straps to get the perfect fit for your neck. The embellishments are intricate and dazzling without being too tacky. It really dresses up the bowtie.  Its pretty lightweight even with all the embellishments on it but it does droop a bit when you put it on. None of the embellishments has fallen off yet so its pretty secure. Overall, its a really nice accessory to dress up your outfit or the collar of your shirt and it could also be nice for prom.
summary: I personally love it since its so decorated and unique

However I have to say I was quite impressed  when I opened it today to check to make sure it was in ok shape after arriving.  It's actually way more high quality then the photos show, they really don't do it justice.  The red stone in the center I thought was going to be cheaply plastic but I think it is actually glass, it's way nicer then I expected and the box it comes in is really awesome and a cute little card like insert from the company was fun to read too.  I now am thinking this will be less of a gag gift and my son may actually adore this tie, I certainly do now!  So for the price especially, totally worth it and a fun unique good quality bow tie, you can't go wrong with this one at all!

Love this!! At first, I didn't realize I needed to take the string out that was already woven under the bust.  Once I wove it back through the top part of swimsuit, I fell in love. So sexy!

Unless you have perky or perfect shaped boobs, you will need to install an additional strap in the top, so that the bra part doesn't sag. My boobs are by no means perfect and hang lower than the padding, creating a really odd silouette. It's fixable, but a design flaw that didn't have different body shapes in mind. There's also this weird roushing that goes down the middle on the butt part. It creates this sagging look. I'm not sure if I got a size too big or what, but it only looks ok when I pull that part in almost like giving myself a wedgie. I think it's supposed to create a nicer silouette in the backside. I'm hoping washing it will make it shrink up a bit. That or it's ruined forever. I can't return it because I wore it once. It is a damn sexy looking swimsuit and appears as if it can be helped. I will update my review if washing it or adding a strap works out.

reviewText: This is an extremely unique piece that people love to comment on. My wife couldn't be happier! Thanks!

My best friend has been having a rough time lately, and sent me a picture of this necklace. She loved it & knew I would, too, because we share a mutual love for all things anatomy, bones, skulls, weird, and especially, dinosaurs.  However, part of her rough time lately is financial.
I was quickly able to locate the necklace on Amazon for a beyond reasonable price for the quality, which is outstanding. I bought one for her, and one for myself.
I ordered it I believe on a Monday morning & Tuesday afternoon, the necklaces were at my door. I'm a long-time prime member, but I've never had something delivered that fast!
Boy, was my best friend filled with joy when I presented her with the necklace that she had just shown me a picture of the day before!

In short, great quality heavy metal, well made (looks just as it does in the photos), super fast delivery, a dinosaur/anatomy lover 'must have' for sure!
I definetely recommend buying, if you're on the fence.
Feel free to ask me anything in the Questions section of this listing!

reviewText: This bra is amazing!!! When I first took it out of the package it looked like it was made for a small child. However, the material is extremely stretchy while being just firm enough to hold everything in place. It's super adorable, extremely comfortable and serves it's function as a sports bra to a T, plus I LOVE the straps in the back. All in all, an excellent choice for active women. I ordered the black, but I'll probably spring for the pink sometime in the near future.

Soft fabric. Very comfortable. Supportive without being constricting. Fabric in the front isn't as thick as other sports bras, so the bra is a bit less modest than standard, especially after sweating. I personally wouldn't wear it on its own (without a top over) for this reason. Worked perfectly, though, and got lots of compliments when wearing it while back straps were visible with a loose draping tank. My new favorite sports bra for running. I'll happily order the other style in this brand too. Maybe two!
I'm pretty well-endowed, so I wish it was a little easier to wrestle on and off.  And the screen printed logo on the back was a little smeared, but I love the look and feel of it on.
summary: A bit small for a DD bust.

reviewText: I'm really happy with this sports bra... It stays in place during my yoga practice so I don't have to keep adjusting it like other bras I have. Plus the back is super cute :)

I've been searching for a stylish but highly functional sports bra/top for awhile now, and never seemed to get the fit I needed from the bras I bought from Beyond Yoga, Lululemon, or Fabletics.  My biggest challenge was to find a sports bra that comfortably supported my full C-cup, and looked fashionable at the same time.  Thankfully, a friend recommended the American Fitness Couture line to me, and much to my delight, I've finally found exactly what I need. The strappy back top is on-trend and looks terrific, while the bra gives me comfortable support and coverage during hard workouts.  I also ordered another style of strappy back sports bras (the DTLA style), and it fits equally well. I learned that all American Fitness Couture products are designed by a leading and longtime fitness expert Linda LaRue--she creates well-made clothes that are versatile, comfortable and good-looking. I highly recommend this line!
summary: Strappy Sports Bras With Sexy Style and Fabulous Function!

reviewText: As a D cup I have been in search of a sports bra that fits all of my adult life. Well, my search is finally over. reviewText: Nice fit as expected.
Ordered a 2x. Fit like a large. Was absolutely beautiful otherwise! Return was easy!

The set is very cute and feels of great quality. I like the fact that the material gives and is stretchy as my little man is a bit thick in the tummy and thighs and I hate how a lot of clothes are too tight in those areas, which frustrates him. Also, he has a huge head and even in 2Ts we have trouble getting items over it but this wasn't an issue with this shirt as it is stretchy. He is a very tall (98th percentile) and at 12 months old is in 2T clothing (size we ordered was 2T). It wouldn't hurt to go up a size but for us ,this size was spot on.

The shirts tag states it is made out of 95% Cotton, 5% polyester and is made in China. I can only assume the shorts are as well but couldn't find a tag. The shirt states WASH SEPARATELY PROFESSIONAL DRY CLEAN RECOMMENDED but there was no way I would wash this alone nor have done professionally. So as I would all his items, it was thrown in the wash with all his other clothes, washed on cold and dried on low. It shrank very little and came out great. Not that I recommend you follow me but just in case you were curious.

The shorts contain patches that are not a part of the fabric but sewn on. I thought for sure my son would sit there and try to remove them, ha, but they didn't faze him at all. The shorts have a draw string and the shorts band is made of elastic so it stretches nicely. The shorts also have two adorable functioning pockets. You could pair the top with other solid colors shorts and the shorts could be paired with solid colored tops.

Overall pleased with the design and very happy with the fit and material.

I received this product free in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. All opinions are my own.
summary: Style and comfort all in one

reviewText: Loved this outfit!

Wow Ok this is another one I got to review for my Godson and when I just came to review it and saw the price oh heck yeah I for sure recommend this little outfit for what they are asking and the quality heck the patches alone are worth that much. I'm honestly in shock. This is a super nice well made cute functional outfit. The only two things I did to it was tie a knot at the end of the drawstrings so they don't pull through and it had a thread that was sticking from one of the patches so I cut it and took a lighter to it ..that's it this outfit is outstanding. It's all interlock quality material. The material it's self is sort of a cotton spandex blend in the T shirt part and then the pants are more of just a cotton/flannel type blend with a really nice elastic waistband and I love that the little pockets are actually really pockets. Like I said I got this one for my Godson but, one of my other reviewer girlfriends got an outfit too and she said this one is still the same as when she got it a few months ago. I'm not even going to say how much this would run if you went to one of the well known retail stores. I do know one thing you won't be sorry or regret this purchase. Like I stated I got it as a complementary sample in exchange for my true feelings on it and it's better than 5 stars I think. Thanks everyone and have a great day! ~Kiki
summary: I HONESTLY FEEL LIKE GIVING THIS MORE THAN 5 STARS & THE PRICE IS OUTSTANDING FOR THE QUALITY.

This outfit is a perfect summer outfit; especially perfect for the 4th of July.  This two piece matching outfit is 100% cotton and very laid back, comfortable look.  This outfit is very cute and patriotic; can be worn out to play, around the house or out and about.  I think that it looked great on my son and he really liked it, especially the shorts. There are a lot of things I liked about this outfit and a few things that I did not care for.
The things I like about the product:
Shirt
+Nice vivid colors
+ Big red, white, and blue smiley face on front
+It is sporty (skate boards) and patriotic (flags, red, white, and blue)
+Fits great, thin breathable material
+One small tag
+Very soft, very cute
+Did not shrink after wash
Shorts
+Fits well
+Patriotic, cute
+Very soft, looks comfortable; child says it is
+Drawstring to tighten and keep shorts up
+Pockets have hidden color (my sons favorite part about the outfit)
 +One pocket is gray and pink in the inside and the other is yellow and blue
+The material is thin and loose fitting, child does not get to hot
 There are a few things that I do not care for about the product.  The first thing is I think it fits a little small, and wish it was a slight bit bigger.  This way it can be worn a little bit longer.  I would recommend getting a size bigger.  The other thing was that the band in the shorts moved after wash.  This is kind of expected and was able to twist it, but a slight pain.
 Overall I am happy with the summer outfit I have received, and my son is very happy with it.  This is a product I would recommend to others as well.
I would like to point out that I have received this product for free, for my own honest opinions, experience, and review that ia all my own.

I am loving this headband!  It fits me perfectly; it is snug enough to stay in place, but not tight enough to be uncomfortable.  This is really important to me, because so many headbands I have owned just slide back, no matter how tight or lose they were.  The main part of this headband is a beautiful turquoise with circle and diamond accents, and tiny beads sewn in.  It's very stylish and unique, and goes with many of my outfits.  It can be worn casually or to dress up an outfit, so it's very versatile.  You can wear this with your hair down, or with a ponytail or bun to make your up-do more exciting.
The turquoise part of the headband is not made to stretch, and the black elastic bands that rest on the underside of your hair stretch very easily and comfortably.  I am extremely impressed with the craftsmanship of this headband, and I'm really happy that I have such a unique accessory now.  I'd definitely recommend this for a stylish way to keep your hair out of your face.

I received this product for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion. I am always very honest and fair when reviewing an item, so please be assured that the product has earned the rating I have given it. I always read other customers' reviews before deciding on purchasing an item, so I take writing reviews seriously.

I LOVE this headband! Every headband I purchase always seems to slip off while I am wearing it, or a little back (messing up my hair) or forward pushing a funky hair bump up with it. This one fits just right, and it doesn't slip while you are wearing it. I also love that the diamonds wrap far enough around the band that it doesn't stop and show the strap right at your ears like they usually do. Also, the band behind the diamonds is thick enough to not feel the the itchy part from the back of the diamond decor. In addition, the headband is not too thick and not too thin. ALL of the diamonds were there, nothing missing. I always am hesitant buying this type of stuff online because I cant check the quality, if the diamonds will fall out before it even gets here, etc. This piece is lovely, and great quality! The color is true to its image, if not, its better! Love this headband!!! I received this product at a discount rate in exchange for my honest review.

I've seen headbands like this on many major retailers' sites lately, but they're so expensive. This one being more affordable, I couldn't wait to give it a try. Quality-wise, it seems on a par with others I've seen, and the beading was well attached. The color is a nice light blue that goes with a lot.

As for sizing, I'd say it fits a standard adult or teen. I have long thick hair, and it went on easily and stayed in place well. It looks great on black hair! I'm sure it would look good on any color, but I was really impressed with how the color stood out against my black hair. I definitely recommend anyone who's on the fence about this style of headband to give this one a try.  I received this product at a discount in return for my honest review.
summary: I have long thick hair, and it went on easily and stayed in place well.

reviewText: AAAA+++

These ponies are beautiful!  You can tell that the elastic holders are high quality.  Two of them have two bands and one had one band.  My favorite are the ones with two bands.  When I use two bands on my pony tail the bands hold my pony tail higher than just one band.  I love how the gems wrap around your hair.  They are very bendable.  Each band has a suede backing which adds to the quality of the hair band.

I received this product for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I ordered this set of ponies in Blush/Ivory/Ivory and it's absolutely lovely. The colors and design are just romantic and dreamy that I would love to wear this on occasions like weddings. This set contains 3 ponies in different designs, one is just plain crystals, one is a mix of ivory and blush and the other one is a mix of blush, crystals and green. I have waist level hair and wears ponies like every single day so these ponies are definitely an upgrade to my regular plain ponies. You'll need to work around it so the design faces up and shows through but doesn't take too much time. Aside from the design, the elastic are stretchable and are great quality too.

Not only does this looks lovely on the hair but it could work as bracelets too. Overall, I'm very thrilled with these ponies and will recommend it.

I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

This is a beautiful set of three pony tail holders.

The colors and items pictured on the listing are true to the colors of beads on the products. I love the size of each of these. The decorative part is big enough to be seen in my hair but not so big that it looks odd. It's a perfect little addition to any pony tail and it certainly helps dress up the look of a pony tail. To make it easier to put in my hair facing up and where I wanted it, I first put my hair into a pony tail and then just wrapped a holder around it.

The crystals and beads are attached very well and it all feels very strong. The elastic is plenty stretchy but definitely not stretched out. After using each one and taking it out, it didn't stretch out the band at all. I love that the backing is a soft suede piece so it bends around your pony tail and also protects your hair when you take it out.

Overall, a great quality set and well worth purchasing for adults or even older children and teens.  I received this product at a reduced rate in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

These are definitely not your $1 store ponytail holders. There are three in a package and they are so beautiful youll want to wear your hair in a ponytail every day. They are made of 100% cotton and woven with beads and resin seeds. Each one has a really tight elastic band. Some have two elastic bands for double security to not only hold your hair but also secure the stunning design on the front. The back of the applique has a leather/suede to protect your hair from pulling when you take the ponytail holder out from your hair. You get three: one has a single line of silver crystals ranging in size with one elastic holder. One has green and silver crystals with silver resin beads in a design that reminds me of a Native American symbol sitting atop of beige suede leather backing and two elastic holders (my personal fav). The other one has three lines of peach green and brown seed beads surrounding by shiny silver resin seeds with two elastic holders. These are so well made and don't tangle your hair when you take them out. I have thin hair and have to double or triple them to get them stay in my hair and they still look amazing. They just shine and give your simple hairdo an elegant look. I would definitely recommend this stunning high quality product. I will update my review if I deem it necessary. I received this item at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. I hope you find this review helpful and happy Amazon shopping.
summary: Makes a simple hairdo look elegant

reviewText: I originally got this headband for my fashionable daughter who loves to look good at all times. However the way it is made I can also use the same headband. The headband does not have elastic it is one long piece and you tie it as small or large ad you need/want. This makes doing different hairstyles with it super easy. This also gives you the option of using it yourself or having someone younger use it without it being too tight or too loose on thier heads. With the regular run of the mill bands, which are made with an elastic in the back to keep the band on place, you don't have the option of having younger kids use them if they are made for adults and vice versa. The band has little circles as a design wrapped around the front. The "string" part of the headband that you tie has small decorative fringes that give it an added elegance and fashionable style. You can dress it down with a more casual clothing (jeans and shirts) or make it more dressy with skirts, blouses or dresses. My daughter and I both are absolutely in love with this headband. As you can see in the pictures she loves to wear it lower on her forehead. I myself like to wear it higher up like a traditional headband. Any way you wear it it looks absolutely beautiful. If your wondering if it stays tied or comes lose after you put it on. Once tied it stays tied. I have tied the back into a bow as well as just a single knot. If you want to fell more secure you can always double knot it but I don't feel that it is necessary to do so. I know we will get lots of wear out of this head band. I purchased this item with a discount for my honest and open opinion.
summary: great band for young or young at heart

reviewText: The shirt arrived quickly and in perfect condition. It is made of a very soft rayon fabric with lots of stretch so it laundered very nicely with no shrinkage or wrinkles. Because of the stretch fabric it lays and flows nicely when worn. It is light and airy enough to be worn on even the warmest days. The button detail down the side is very classy. This top can be worn dressed up to work with a casual business attire or worn more casually. I wore it to work with a pair of slacks and received several compliments on how nice it looked. I did receive this at a reduced cost in return for my honest opinion. I do not give my opinion lightly as I myself rely on others opinions and reviews when making my own purchasing decisions. I would highly recommend this shirt!

I like this top because the color and fabric are awesome.  It's a rayon with a very soft, heavy drape and breathable.  Also, although the fabric is thin and light, it doesn't show through.  I've bought from this brand before and love their products because of the high quality fabrics that tend to wash well and feel nice against the skin.

It's definitely larger than what I expected, and fits more like an oversized tunic.  As you can see from the picture, it isn't really tapered at the waist as it is shown in the picture.  The description however states that it is a "loose drapey top" and so keep that in mind.  I still like it and will likely wear it a lot, it just turned out somewhat different from the photo.  The panel with the buttons also points down a bit so it has an asymmetrical hem, which looks great with a pair of half tights.

I bought a size small, and am 5'9" and 135 lbs.  I bought this at a discount in exchange for my unbiased and truthful review, but only buy products I actually wear and am genuinely interested in.

reviewText: Looks so nice for the price.. Perfect size though

This shirt has become on of my favorite shirts. It's kinda casual, yet kinda not "weekend lounging on the couch" all in one, yet retains the comfort of a weekend lounging shirt. It has a great fit, and has a nice length to it. Be warned, like many of H2H's products, they are *exactly* the sizes they claim, with the following caveats:
- They are *all* slim fit (noted as "fitted" in this case). Slim is not curvy, a little extra or muscular.
- They are real sizes, not vanity sizes. The US market has a recent tendency towards vanity sizing (such as size 34 pants having a 37" waist instead of 34").

All in all, the shirt is comfy and sized as promised. If it helps, I'm 5'10" and 168 pounds, and a medium is just about perfect on me. If you're about my height and over 175, I'd look elsewhere.

reviewText: I bought this to wear under my Elizabethan noble lady costume for a Renaissance festival, and it's a good value for the price. However, I'm 5'4 and it was almost short on me, so if you're taller you might want to look elsewhere. The combination of velcro and drawstring at the waist was secure. If you're wearing it under a thin dress you'll definitely want to wear a petticoat over it to smooth out the silhouette of the hoops which can show through the fabric. You can see the hoops through the felt and fabric front of my skirt in the attached photo.

This was extremely frustrating. First off, I'm a costumer and a seamstress, a crinoline should be worn at the waist, not the hip. To make this the correct length (where the last hoop is only a few inches off the ground) this would need to have been worn around my hips. I am 5'7 with a long torso but shorter legs. The last hoop falls at my shin making the crinoline far too short to be worn properly. It also fits up to a US size 10. I wear between a 10 and a 12 and it was a tight fit on me. This does not accommodate up to US size 16 as listed.  I paid for overnight shipping on this item for an event and ended up not being able to use it. I am not thrilled to say the least.
summary: Made for someone 5'0-5'2 - far too short for avg buyer

reviewText: Love!!!

You must understand TLBC is specifically for Petites, so the sizing is specifically for a petite frame.

A regularly sized bra is too big for a petite, the band size and cup volume are not proportioned for us, and if you're a regular size these petite bras will be too small for you! The sizing is just like regular bras, bust measurement minus band measurement ( I have a 31" bust and 28" band, giving me a C-cup) but cup size is nothing without band size! It's all about volume and proprtions. A 30C is a 32B is a 34A, all those measurements have the same volume with a different configuration of band size and cup placement.

I am a 30C (one of the most difficult sizes to find) and this bra fits nearly perfectly, because the band is a little snug but the cups are absolutely correct! I highly recommend TLBC for all petites.

reviewText:
This is simply a beautiful and good quality clutch wallet. I gave it to my mother and she simply gushes over it. It complements her purple handbag to a tee. Now all she needs to complete her set is a purple leather case for her iPhone!

I hope my photos do a good job of conveying the look and quality of this wallet. Although it is obviously not real leather, the feel is nice. It has a more rigid feel than leather, but for a clutch wallet, that's actually better so you don't wear it out quickly. On the inside, there are many pockets and crevices for you to store all the things that you would in a normal clutch wallet. There simply is nothing to gripe about - since it is less than $40, you cannot gripe about that is it not real leather. But the aesthetics make up for any shortcomings, and if you have an outfit that needs this to complement, then you will not be disappointed. I definitely recommend you giving this a try.

I was provided a review sample so I can make an honest assessment of its quality so you can have a more informed buying decision if you choose to purchase it.

I received this item to test and review, so made a short video talking about it. When I get items like this to review, my first step is to hand them to my wife and let her criticize. Upon handing her this wallet, her first thought was, "wow, there's lots of storage!" followed by "you are not getting this back." That to me is a sign that it's a good wallet. Now, I know that the light eggplant color may not be everyone's preference, but there are other colors that you can get this one in and I can say based on this one you should be happy with the build quality and utility that this wallet will offer. The stitching is well done and the pockets are plentiful on the inside. This can be a wallet which goes in a purse or a clutch that is carried instead of a large purse. Overall I would say to watch the video here, ask me questions if you have them and pick on up if the style appeals to you.
summary: It's a very useful wallet, and the wife approves!

I did not realize that the "Tops 2pcs" would actually arrive as a shorts and blouse set, comprised of the teal-blue blouse and the cream shorts pictured. This surprise would have been pleasant if the shorts had fit, but my American curves are just a little too bootylicious. However, the XL blouse fit well enough - I am 5'8", measurements 36-28-40, and usually wear a US size 4/6 in tops and an 8/10 in pants. The material feels like a thin treated linen and has a bit of a shine, but there are no labels (which is fine, as I usually cut out tags anyways). Until it is worn a few times and the stiffness of the fabric breaks down a bit, it will probably resemble a high end scrubs top.

Pros:
-maybe actually linen
-true to color
-blouse true to sizing information
-minimalistic, clean design

Cons:
-comes as shorts and a blouse, not two blouses
-no way to select a different size for shorts
summary: American curves are just a little too bootylicious

reviewText: I was happy to discover these Gioberti brand mens shirts.  I started with one, liked the fit, style and material of it so I ordered 3 more.  What is great about them is there are so many different color options.  I got 3 designs that look perfect for casual wear and another that is a classier design that made it appear dressier.  But either way they are of such a quality that they can pass for casual or dress shirts.  I found the fit to be true to size.  I have just lost weight and needed to go down to a size xl.  These fit perfectly.  If you like your shirts a little loose or baggy you may want to go up a size for while not being slim fit they are more of a narrow cut.  So if you need a little extra room go one size up.  I am loving these shirts.  The design patterns actually look even more impressive in person and the material is very durable while looking great and feeling good on the body.  Nice to be able to have a casual look with these shirts that manages to be classed up a little.
Husband love the shirt, but it does run a little small. I had to return my original order for a larger size, but the return was fast and easy. Will definitely purchase another in another pattern.

reviewText: I love this dress. So cute, very comfortable. A hippie, every-day dress. Unfortunately, the material is literally falling apart.

This item arrived Thursday (it's now Saturday) and after reading a lot of the reviews, I was nervous to recieve it. First, the side seem was double stitched onto another part of the dress. That was an easy enough fix. I have a deseamer and was able to restitch the hemming for what I had to rip off (no pictures included as it didn't seem too big a deal at the time). But then after wearing the dress out for the first tome today someone pointed out to me that the back seam was ripped wide open and had a huge hole in it (pictures included). I'm so disappointed. It's a beautiful dress and the fabric isn't at all itchy like I expected. If I could return it, I would but everyone's saying you have to pay your own shipping costs?? I know it's cheap and incredibly cute in theory but it's just not worth the hassle.
summary: So disappointed to say it's not worth it

reviewText:
Based on reviews and what I've observed about Oriental made clothing, I ordered size 8, one size larger than what I normally wear.  (I'm 5'5", 130 lb)
Should've ordered my normal size 6...or even a 4.  The dress is large on me, sliding off one shoulder or the other; nearly dragging the ground. The material is somewhat shiny; a "pattern" like linen, but you know it's not ... rather like cheap sheer curtain material.  It's a double layer of fabric though, so the dress isn't see through. The fabric also snags rather easily. All that being said, it's cool (even with the 3/4 sleeves), comfortable and perfect for what I bought it for...lounging and light yard/garden work.  If I had bought the proper size, it would work for casual wear outside the home as well.  I've washed the dress, and dried in the dryer on normal heat, several times without shrinkage or wrinkling (wish it HAD shrunk :))
Update: Even though this dress fits loosely with no strain on sleeve seams, both back seams are starting to pull apart. The fabric is just coming apart. This after only a couple months and not an excessive amount of usage or washing. I've readjusted my rating from 4 to 3 stars.
summary: Comfortable, loose, flowing, cool...but not holding up very well.

reviewText:
I love this dress. Usually don't write reviews but I feel compelled to say how lovely this dress is. It's very well made, I couldn't make it for this price! Very difficult for me to find this style here in the US.
I'm 5'2 and weigh 130, my arms are somewhat on the slim side. I bought the size 8 dress with sleeves. I usually wear a medium top and 6-10 pants.

Update: bought a second dress, this one orange. It fit great. Like the first one, received many compliments. This one held up in the wash. Gonna try to see the brown one.

I love the look and feel of the dress. Got lots of compliments on it on the one day I wore it, BUT the dress material ripped after the first wear. The tear is in the rear of the dress, on a seam, about four inches long. I noticed the tear when I pulled it out of the "delicate" cycle washing machine, where it had washed as a sole garment. The instructions on care indicate it can be machine washed, so this is a big disappointment, especially since I really like the dress itself. Did not wear within 30 days of buying, so looks like I've lost on this one.
summary: 1st one did not survive delicate wash cycle--2nd one did

The size was slightly baggier than I had hoped, but not unwearable. The reason I ultimately donated it (tags still on) is because this is very clearly not what most people would call 'linen' or even largely cotton. I think others have noted this, too, but it's a scratchy fabric that sort of passes for linen from a distance. It does not fit and move the way linen does when wearing it. It does not say anywhere on a tag that the material is cotton/linen. I also watched some videos of how to test the composition of a fabric by burning a scratch of it (I snipped off a small piece from the underside) and it didn't seem to burn at all. I just kind of melted. I don't know what the composition is, but I am pretty certain that it is not cotton or linen.
summary: Does not seem to be cotton/linen

reviewText: I wear a size 2-4,  I ordered this based on feedback regarding woman of my size and both size charts.  I ordered the small size 4.  I feel a 6 or 8 would be more comfortable.  I ordered my mother a 10 and tried it on and it was big but more comfy than the size 4 ( more baggy-ness) even though the 4 fits.  I feel this is one of those things that depends partially on personal preference of how you like or wear your clothes.  I can't stand anything tight. It was not tight and does fit perfectly but, I feel a 6 would have been more comfy.  I will wear it regardless.  The sizes don't differ much between them 2 inches roughly.  The size 10 I got for my mom ( I tried on for kicks, it was way too long- I stated this for size reference since it is a bit tricky a size 10 would be too long if you are 5'4)- so even though I ordered a 4 and it fits, If I order more I will go up to a 6.  I am just under 5'4 and I weigh 112. Im pretty flat chested as well 32 A.  I do love the garment and will likely purchase more. I am sure when said and done I will have a variety of sizes ranging from 4 -6 and possibly even 8 depending on the garment.  I ordered my mom the 10 and her belly pooched a bit, it fit and she liked it but.. A larger size would indeed fit just as well and give her the extra flow the dress is suppose to have. I feel it is true to size but too much true to size if you want it to appear as shown my opinion is go up a size -again that really is personal preference of how you wear your clothes. A true size will fit but my opinion is a size up gives it the look it is suppose to have.

The fabric on this dress is wonderful!  It is much softer than I was anticipating.  I really love the look of these large, loose, and flowing dresses.  There are a couple different clothing companies selling this similar style of dress, and at this price, I thought I would give this one a try.  I ordered the green version of the dress, with the longer sleeves, in the hopes that this dress would carry me through the summer weather into the fall.

The color of this dress is almost identical to the color it appears to be online.  I love the green coloring with the greyish- tan coming out the bottom.  It is a lovely color combination.  This dress is nice and loose, and has a really flowing and feminine look to it.  I feel really pretty in this dress.

Because I am short, the dress does not fit me like the model in the picture.  I am 5'3", and it hits me at my ankles.  I knew it was going to be longer on me, and I am okay with that.  In size, it is very true to size.  I usually wear a US size 4, and I ordered a size 4 in this dress.  It fit perfectly.

I really like that it is very loose. It makes it very comfortable in the hotter weather!  Currently I am wearing it with sandals, but it is going to look really pretty with tights and Mary Jane shoes in the fall!

It is not 100% cotton, but has that nice soft cotton feel to it.  It does have a bit of polyester blended in.

I am very glad that I ordered this dress!  Great price, great comfort, fabulous dress!
summary: Great price, great comfort, fabulous dress!

reviewText:
Love the dress, nice quality, but the fit ran extremely small. I'm 5'1 and 137 lbs and typically wear US women's 8-10. According to the size chart, I would wear a medium, but with all the reviews about it running small, I ordered the large.  It was still too tight for my preference.

It would have zipped up.  But it would knhave been very very form fitting.  And while that may be fine for some fit and trim women, with my 40-something belly pudge and back rolls, it was quite unattractive.

I liked the dress enough I would try an XL, but sadly it is unavailable.

reviewText: Good material hut a little big for me
Buy a size down, but very lovely dress!

This orange color is beautiful. It's a bright and cheerful color that made me feel good when I wore it. Even though the fabric is on the thin side, since the under layer is full length from top to bottom, there's no transparency at all. This isn't linen, but it also doesn't wrinkle as badly as linen. I'm generally a size 6 or 8 petite at 5'2" tall. For me, the longest part of the dress was at my ankles. I bought a small, and the fit was perfect - loose as I wanted it to be but not like a shapeless bag. I'm considering another purchase in a different color. I can't say anything as to how long it will last as I've only worn this once, but the seams are intact, and there don't appear to be any issues.

This is a beautiful dress. It's light, cool, comfortable, nicely made. The color on the website is true to the reality in the orange that I bought. I bought a size 8.  It fits perfect through my shoulders and sleeve seam hits right where it should. My shoulders are 14ish inches wide. I'm 38" in the bust and it is comfortable, not too tight.  It has a modest, open neck.  There are no buttons or any kind of closure.  It pulls over the head. The sleeves are loose and almost transparent, very feminine and again comfortable to wear, coming down past the elbow, 3/4 sleeve.  I weigh 130 not so fit pounds and my arms are slender for an old woman so the armholes are perfect, not too tight. I'm 5'4" and the dress comes mid calf, perfect for my tastes.  It is nice wrinkled or ironed. I prefer a little ironing.  Hope these details help someone. The first dress I ordered was larger. It was too big, but I had no trouble returning it for a refund and return postage was paid by Amazon. That's why I love shopping with them. Fast delivery too.
After reading reviews I see people had trouble after washing. These are delicate fabrics and should be washed by hand. We oldtimers understand taking care of clothing, unlike synthetics that can be thrown in the washer. It's very easy to launder by hand. Just a suggestion if you want it to hold up.
summary: This is a beautiful dress. It's light

reviewText: The fabric is the perfect blend of a sort of silky linen so it's not hot and scratchy, but also doesn't look like you're wearing rags, as it might appear if it were 100% cotton. It's not as stiff and likely to wrinkle in the pronounced way linen does. The underneath layer isn't just a fake piece attached just above the hem either. I ordered the half-sleeve version in orange, and it's flattering for my chunky, large chested short person physique. If the color choices were more varied, I would order more of these. Alas, I'm not so into army green; but because I like this dress so much, I may just develop a liking for it!

reviewText: This is a fantastic dress!!  I live in Arizona and it's hot, hot, hot in the summer; this dress is so lightweight and flowy that air circulates well.  The fabric is seriously soft.  I recently wore this back East to a hot and humid picnic and was the most comfy person all day.  I got many complements on the dress.  It's the kind you can dress up or down depending on  shoes, jewelry, etc.  In AZ it's hot outside but then inside offices and stores they blast the AC so you are either broiling or freezing.  I can wear this dress to the office and then throw a blazer or cardigan on and it looks great.  Also a good look with a shawl.  Looks great with flats, with heels, and with boots.  I'm telling you, it's wonderful!!  Also, I don't like low-cut dresses or blouses so this is great in that department, too.  The only (possible) drawback is that the armholes are cut low so you may have to be careful what bra you wear or switch to a camisole. (Which is better than having the armholes be too tight!)  When it cools off around here I'll probably wear it with a t-shirt underneath.  Fit was as I expected, be sure to look at the size chart for THIS item for THIS merchant, because there are many sellers who have the same style but use different size charts.
summary: You have GOT to get this dress!
